hits.title: TB World
hits.description:
Discover the fascinating world of the game Toka Life, which will give you a sea of creativity and joy! Here you can bring your fantasies to life, creating stylish images for characters and cozy interiors.

The design process will be a real pleasure: choose from a variety of clothes, accessories and interior items to make each image and space unique. Transform your characters and their surroundings to create a unique atmosphere.

This game is your personal creativity workshop where you create your own story. Start your exciting journey into the world of design today and let your ideas flow, creating unique images and cozy interiors!
hits.howToPlayText:
The game opens up endless possibilities for creativity and fun, with your main task being to bring your fantasies to life and create unique stories.

The controls are intuitive and user-friendly, making it perfect for players of all ages. The simple interface allows you to easily move characters, items, and decor by swiping across the screen. You can tap on clothing and accessories to dress up your characters and drag items to decorate interiors.

In TB World, there are no strict rules or fixed storylines. You become the author of your own adventures and stories, using a wide range of scenarios, characters, and items. Your imagination is the only limit in this world of creativity and possibilities!

hits.title: Hidden Object: Clues and Mysteries
hits.description:
Hidden Object: Clues and Mysteries transforms the classic hidden object genre into an engaging adventure. Immerse yourself in a world of riddles, concealed items, and unsolved enigmas.

Join an experienced detective whose calm and reassuring voice will guide you every step of the way. Search for clues in a variety of charming locations: cozy living rooms, bustling caf√©s, warm kitchens, private studies, and more.

Each scene is a unique setting where your keen eye and clever thinking will be essential to uncover all the hidden items.

Enjoy serene melodies and a cozy ambiance, as this game is designed for relaxation and leisure. Take your time to solve every mystery and feel the satisfaction of becoming a true detective.
hits.howToPlayText:
In the game, you can freely move left and right across locations and zoom in to find hidden objects.

The game is available on both PC and mobile devices, allowing you to play anytime, anywhere.

Show off your creativity: Idol Livestream: Fashion Game is all about expressing your fashion sense and enjoying the excitement of live reactions. Will your doll become a star? Or will your design stand out in the competition? The more fashionable and creative you get, the more praise you‚Äôll receive from viewers!

Ready to become a top designer and live-stream your stunning outfits? Play Idol Livestream: Doll Dress Up now and show the world your fashion skills!
hits.howToPlayText: How to play: Choose from an array of trendy clothes, stunning accessories, and beautiful hairstyles to dress up your doll. Once your doll is ready, they can join a fashion competition or go live in a thrilling livestream, where viewers will react to your design. The better your styling, the more positive reactions you‚Äôll get, so get creative and impress the audience!

hits.title: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War
hits.description:
Lead Your Tank Warriors to Glory Across Time!
Welcome to Age of Tank Warriors: TD War, the ultimate tank warriors strategy game! Travel through the ages of war, leading your tank army from Stone Age warriors to the sci-fi space future. Upgrade your battle tanks, engage in intense Clash of Tank Warriors battles, and use tower defense (TD) strategy to conquer every era. 100vs100 survival battles await‚Äîwill you rewrite history and become the greatest tank warlord?
hits.howToPlayText:
Age of Tanks Warriors is a one-click battle game, so the actual combat portion of the game is fairly simple. The difficulty lies in the strategy of how you use your army and weapons to kill off your opponents before they kill you and destroy your fortress. Once you do this, you get to upgrade your army and weapons for an even more effective strategy.

The game begins with your stone cave, which is directly opposite your opponent's cave. You can deploy your soldiers by clicking the small icon on the bottom right of your screen. The only hitch is that you may not have enough soldiers to send out in time to match your opponent's troop!

Your task on each level is to defeat the opposing army and destroy their shelter. As the levels advance, so do the fortresses, making it even more difficult throughout the ages. Fighting begins with sticks and stones but eventually turns into tanks and artillery.

hits.title: Chess Online Multiplayer
hits.description:
Play Chess Online and Improve Your Skills!

Are you ready to challenge your mind and enjoy the timeless game of chess? Chess Multiplayer is the perfect place to play chess online ‚Äî no registration required! Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a seasoned player, our platform offers an exciting chess experience for everyone.

Why choose Chess for Free?

Multiple game modes: play against the computer, compete online with players from around the world, challenge a friends, or play together on the same screen!
21 difficulty levels: choose your opponent ‚Äî from Beginner to World Champion. Perfect for both newcomers and chess masters!
Time control modes: pick your preferred pace with Unlimited, Bullet, Blitz, Rapid, or Classic modes.
Interactive features: highlight possible moves, cancel a move if you make a mistake, use interactive hints to find the best move, and analyze your game after it‚Äôs over to learn from your mistakes.
Personalized experience: customize the look of the pieces and the board, set handicaps, and keep track of your rating, points, and game statistics.
Extra fun: share funny cartoon emotions with your opponent and make your game more enjoyable!
Improve your chess skills and have fun ‚Äî play Chess for free right now!
hits.howToPlayText:
Chess Online Multiplayer follows the classic rules of chess. The goal of the game is to checkmate your opponent‚Äôs king, putting it in a position where it is under threat of capture and has no legal moves to escape.

**Getting Started**

1. **Choose the game type:**
* play online against other players;
* challenge the computer;
* play together on the same screen with a friend.

2. **If you‚Äôre playing against the computer:**
* select the opponent‚Äôs difficulty level (from Beginner to World Champion);
* choose whether to use a handicap and interactive hints.

3. **If you‚Äôre playing with a friend:**
* decide on the time control mode (Unlimited, Bullet, Blitz, Rapid, Classic).
* choose your bet

**Basic Rules and Gameplay**

* Players take turns making moves.
* Pawns move forward and capture diagonally.
* Knights move in an ¬´L¬ª shape.
* Other pieces have their own unique moves.

To succeed, develop a strategy: protect your pieces, control the center of the board, and anticipate your opponent‚Äôs moves.

The game ends when one player checkmates the opponent‚Äôs king (winning the game) or when a draw is achieved under certain conditions.

**Draw Conditions**
A draw is a result where neither player wins, and the game ends in a tie. It can occur under the following circumstances:
* **stalemate:** when a player has no legal moves but is not in check;
* **three-fold repetition of the position:** when the same position occurs three times;
* **50 moves without a capture or pawn move;**
* **insufficient material to checkmate;**
* mutual agreement between players.

**Special Chess Moves**

**Castling**
Castling is a special move involving the king and a rook. It can be performed only if:
* neither the king nor the rook has moved yet;
* there are no other pieces between the king and the rook;
* the king is not in check;
* the king does not pass through or stop on squares that are under attack.

This move helps to protect the king and connect the rooks for better defense.

**En Passant (Taking on Pass)**
En passant is a special pawn capture. If your opponent moves a pawn two squares forward and lands next to your pawn, you can capture it on your next move as if it had moved only one square. Your pawn will take its place, but this capture must be done immediately.

**Additional Features**

* **Made a mistake?** Use the move undo function to reconsider your strategy.
* After each match, a detailed analysis highlights mistakes and suggests better moves.
* You can replay specific moments to strengthen your understanding of the game.
* Save your rating and choose different time modes (Bullet, Blitz, Rapid).
* Customize the board and pieces to your liking.
* Review the move history and express your emotions by communicating with your opponent using playful cartoon emojis.

hits.howToPlayText: Dive into the world of word solitaire, where traditional playing cards are replaced with word cards and category cards. hits.title: Merge Fruit Characters
hits.description:
Enjoy nice fruit puzzle game with physics! Match fruits, create new characters, use bonuses. 26 heroes, combos, daily rewards. Relax and play for free!

Magical puzzle game where each fruit is a unique character with its own story! Dive into an amazing world where you can match identical fruits to create new ones. Turn small blueberries into juicy strawberries and strawberries into ripe cherries! The game features 26 incredible characters, each with their own personality and catchphrases. 

Use powerful bonuses: 
- "Multicolor" merges with any fruit
- "Meteor" breaks through the fruits to the bottom of glass
- "Bomb" explodes small fruits and gives X10 points
- "Grow" increases all identical fruits by one
- "Magnet" allows you to pull the interfering fruit out of the thicket
- "Microscope" temporarily reduces all fruits to micro sizes
- "Tornado" shakes the glass

Spin the wheel of fortune, get daily rewards, and buy upgrades in the store. Realistic physics, beautiful animations, and pleasant music create a cozy atmosphere. Start your adventure in the ¬´Merge Fruit Characters - Fruit Kingdom¬ª right now!
hits.howToPlayText:
Throw fruits into the glass and combine the same ones to create new fruits and unlock unique characters. For example, two Baby Blue Blueberries will turn into Princess Stella "Little Beak" Strawberry-Belle, and two sisters will turn into Champion Cherry "Bouncy Bunny" Cherryton. 

 Clicking allows you to make a quick throw, while holding and moving activates a laser sight for more accurate hits.

 Fill the glass, but be careful, if even one fruit falls out of the glass, the game will end. Use the space wisely, and develop your own system!

Use bonuses to progress faster in the game.
Spin the wheel of fortune to receive random rewards, and don't forget to check out the daily quests - completing them will earn you useful bonuses. Upgrade your abilities in the store and progress through the levels, unlocking new features and characters.

 Become a leader in points and levels, chat with others, and share your achievements!

hits.title: ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang
hits.description:
ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang is a casual food game where you are the star of a mukbang stream. You get to enjoy delicious dishes, interact with your audience, and grow your popularity with every bite, all on camera! Each meal takes you closer to becoming even more popular, so keep eating, keep engaging, and watch your virtual foodie journey unfold.
How to Play ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang
Relaxing, fun, and super engaging, ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang lets you enjoy cooking, eating, and styling in a way that‚Äôs not only entertaining but also rewarding. Keep streaming, earning, and upgrading to become the most popular mukbang star! Become a livestream star with your channel, serving up drinks, dishes, and endless ASMR satisfaction. There are a few livestreams that you‚Äôll participate in to get as many likes and hearts as possible from your fans.
Curate Your Stream
Start with a drink, pick your glass from thin-rimmed, stemmed, and rounded, and then add ice cubes in shapes from classic squares to cute bears. Garnish with fruits like lime, kiwi, or raspberry (some unlock as you earn rewards). Choose your syrup, give it a shake, add a straw, and get ready to sip your way into livestream fame. But beware ‚Äî a boring drink could mean negative feedback!
Dig In on Camera
Once the drinks are done, move on to food. Eat tempura, sundaes, ramen, chicken, lobster, and even mix them in one stream for bigger rewards. The more fun and satisfying the experience, the more your audience grows. Once your food is ready, it‚Äôs time to go live! Eat, chat, and interact with your viewers as you enjoy the food. Your realistic ASMR sounds will make the experience feel so satisfying that your viewers won‚Äôt want to miss a moment. Engage with fans and watch your audience grow!
Go to the Supermarket
Start by shopping for ingredients, then move on to cooking mouth-watering dishes! From spicy noodles to delicious seafood and even sweet treats, the possibilities are endless. Prepare a meal that will make your audience hungry for more! For some of your livestreams, you get to shop for snacks and treats like sushi, dumplings, candy, and ice cream, but don‚Äôt get brain freeze! Pay with your card, stock up, and get ready to stream again.
Cook, Stream, and Engage
Shop for ingredients, cook delicious meals, then go live. Eat, chat, and interact while your realistic ASMR sounds keep viewers hooked. Successful streams bring in money. Spend it on stylish outfits for your character, or unlock even more mouth-watering food to keep your audience entertained.
If you‚Äôre a livestream fan, this game can get quite addictive. The more successful your streams, the more money you make. Use your earnings to upgrade your girl‚Äôs outfits, giving her a stylish and trendy appearance. You can also buy even more delicious food to satisfy your growing audience and keep the mukbang going!

hits.description:
Save all the mini-crewmates from the traitor in single player or online. 

Play online with other players, or with friends by creating your own room! 
 
The horror game "Imposter 3D online horror" features 7 online multiplayer game modes and 8 unique maps!  
 
"Mafia" - up to 10 players, including an impostor who looks like the other players. But at any moment he can turn into an imposter and catch the other players! Use a vote to identify the imposter and shout "Impostor among us!". Be careful and collect all the little ones. 
"PvE" - play with friends against an imposter controlled by the computer. 
"PvP" - spacemen against imposter, players play for impostors. 
"Zombie" - Infection mode, who has been caught by the imposter, he also becomes an impostor.  
"Hide and Seek" - In this mode, you have to hide, playing as an astronaut, and hold out until the end of the round. Collecting babies in this mode is optional!
"Hunt" - collect most babies in time!
"Rescue" - Imposters can get astronauts in a cage!

"G" - throw batteries

Playing as an imposter:
"R" - use shout.
"E" - use, to catch the player, to hide in the vent

In Mafia mode for the imposter:
"2" - turn into an imposter

hits.title: Coffee Color Blocks
hits.description:
Coffee Color Blocks is a bright and relaxing puzzle game where you move colored shapes around the board and guide them to gates of the matching color. Each correct connection fills the cups inside the shape ‚Äî your goal is to fill the entire figure without blocking the path.

The game combines smooth animations, cozy coffee aesthetics, satisfying mechanics and gradually increasing difficulty. New shapes, color mixes and special mechanics appear as you progress. It‚Äôs an enjoyable and smart puzzle that quickly becomes addictive.
hits.howToPlayText:
Move the blocks. Tap and slide shapes across the board to bring them to gates of the same color.
Match colors. A block fills only when it reaches its matching gate ‚Äî this fills the cups inside.
Fill the whole shape. Complete the level by filling every segment of the figure.
Avoid dead ends. Think ahead ‚Äî some blocks can block others if moved carelessly.
Progress and unlock mechanics. Each level introduces new shapes, colors and puzzles to solve.

hits.title: English Checkers Online Multiplayer
hits.howToPlayText:
**How to Play English Checkers**

English Checkers is a strategic board game where players aim to capture their opponent‚Äôs checkers or block them completely. Here‚Äôs how to get started and understand the basic rules:

**Game Objective**
The goal is to either capture all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers or completely block them so they can‚Äôt make any legal moves.

**Types of Checkers**
- **Simple checker:** moves diagonally forward one square and can only capture forward.
- **King:** can move diagonally both forward and backward on any free square and can capture in both directions. When a simple checker reaches the last row, it becomes a king and gains these additional abilities.

**Basic Movement and Capture Rules**
1. **Movement:**
- simple checkers move diagonally forward one square at a time;
- kings can move diagonally in any direction on any free square.

2. **Capture:**
- if your checker is next to your opponent‚Äôs checker and there‚Äôs an empty square behind it, you must jump over the opponent‚Äôs checker and land in the empty square, capturing the opponent‚Äôs piece;
- captures are mandatory ‚Äî if you have the option to capture, you must do so;
- if a capture leads to another possible capture, you must continue capturing as part of the same turn until no more captures are possible;
- when a simple checker reaches the last row during a capture, it becomes a king but cannot make further moves in the same turn.

3. **Choosing Capture Options:**
- if there are multiple capture options available, you can choose which one to make;
- the ¬´Turkish strike¬ª rule means that a checker that has been beaten but not yet removed from the board can block the path of a king or another checker.

**Winning the Game**
You win the game by:
- capturing all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers;
- blocking your opponent so that they have no legal moves left.

**Getting Started in English Checkers Online Multiplayer**
1. **Choose your game mode:** play against the computer, compete online with real players, or play with a friend on the same screen.
2. **Select your difficulty level or opponent:** if playing against the computer, choose from 10 difficulty levels; if playing online, find a real opponent.
3. **Choose your side:** select whether you want to play as black or white.
4. **Start playing:** follow the rules of movement and capture to outmanoeuvre your opponent and achieve victory.

Enjoy the game and sharpen your strategic skills with English Checkers Online Multiplayer!

hits.howToPlayText: The objective of  is to earn the highest possible score by shooting the bubbles. hits.title: Italian Brainrot Find the Difference
hits.description:
Italian Brainrot: Find the Difference is a fast, funny, and bizarre puzzle game where absurdity meets sharp-eyed fun. Each of the 30 levels features two nearly identical images‚Äîbut with small, sneaky changes hidden in plain sight.

Designed especially for kids, this game brings together cartoon chaos and visual brain-training in a way that‚Äôs goofy, creative, and totally unforgettable. You‚Äôre not just spotting differences‚Äîyou‚Äôre diving into a wild universe full of absurd characters and hilarious scenes.

üß† How It Works
30 handcrafted levels with detailed, funny illustrations
Each level has 5 differences to find
No timers, no pressure‚Äîperfect for kids and families
Play directly in-browser on mobile or desktop
üé≠ Key Characters in the Italian Brainrot Universe
Tralalero Tralala
A three-legged shark always rocking bright Nike sneakers. Whether he's leaping through chaos or fighting with Bombardino Crocodilo, he's full of attitude and absurd energy.

Bombardino Crocodilo
A crocodile-headed creature with the body of a WWII bomber plane. He drops more confusion than bombs and makes every level feel like a fever dream.

Tung Tung
A living, walking wooden drum (inspired by Indonesian bedug) with a baseball bat. While sometimes mistaken as Italian Brainrot, he‚Äôs a crossover character who adds international flair to the madness.

Ballerina Cappuccina
A graceful dancer with a cappuccino cup for a head. She pirouettes through scenes of total nonsense, highlighting the game‚Äôs charming chaos
hits.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:
Mouse Click: Click on the difference.

üì± Mobile Controls:
Tap: Tap on the difference.

ü§™ Bonus Tips:
Some differences are sneaky‚Äîlook for color swaps, missing items, or silly changes.

No timer‚Äîplay at your own pace.

Each level gets more bizarre, so keep those eyes sharp!

hits.title: Golf Orbit
hits.description:
Golf Orbit is an exciting golf simulator game within sports category where you aim to launch golf balls to incredible heights, even reaching Mars. Have fun in one-shot golf battles, complete challenging levels, and master the art of the perfect shot. Compete to become the golf king in this entertaining and unique golfing adventure.

Core: A vibrant and highly accessible casual sports title centered on the fundamentals of golf.
Loop: Player skill is directly rewarded with in-game currency for successful long-range shots, facilitating a clear progression path through continuous gear upgrades.
Start: The game features highly intuitive controls and is immediately engaging, supported by a robust system of mini-quests to drive early-game retention.
Playgama Fact: The game is fully integrated with Playgama SDK: instant login and cross-device saves between PC and mobile. HTML5. Stable performance regardless of internet quality.
Visual: Features a polished Stylized / Cartoon art direction, providing an appealing and universally pleasant visual experience.
Key Feature: Offers an enjoyable blend of satisfying gameplay challenge coupled with eye-catching, high-quality graphics.
hits.howToPlayText:
The key to Golf Orbit is to aim and hit the golf ball as far as possible. This one-button game has relatively easy gameplay, but getting that perfect shot can be challenging. Tap and hold your left mouse button to set the power and release to hit the ball. As the ball soars, it bounces off various objects, gaining extra distance but, if you hit a perfect shot, the ball can destroy the obstacles it faces, including trees and buildings.

As in regular golf, if your ball ends in water or in sand bunkers

Your distance will be recorded with each shot, keeping you accountable for your progress. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing.

Collect coins during the flight to upgrade your equipment and improve your shots. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing. Points can be accumulated in various ways. The longer the distance you shoot, the more points you get. You can also unlock points with a surprise spin.

If you score a birdie (hole in 2 shots) or an eagle (hole in one), you'll amass way more points and will be able to improve the features of your future shots.

There are three elements to a perfect shot: strength, speed, and bounce. You can give each one of these a boost with reward points.

Q- lady
J - jack

hits.description:

At the beginning of the game, there are already some numbers in them (from 1 to 9). The player is required to fill in the free cells with numbers from 1 to 9 so that in each row, in each column and in each small 3 √ó3 square, each digit would occur only once.
There are multiple levels of difficulty you can choose. Beware of mistakes you can make.

hits.title: Catch the Bear
hits.description:
Catch the Bear: A Cozy Puzzle Adventure üêªüß©

A bright, feel-good puzzle game that mixes colorful bears, smart block-sliding mechanics, and satisfying logic challenges. Designed to be both relaxing and mentally engaging.

Gameplay
Slide blocks and catch bears into matching colors. Simple at first, but increasingly tricky as new obstacles, routes, and surprises appear. Each level tests your logic, planning, and strategy.

Key Features
Easy to learn, challenging to master
Adorable bear characters and cozy visuals
Time limits for extra challenge
Gradually increasing difficulty
Ideal for fans of match, logic, and block puzzles

How to Play
Slide blocks freely
Match bears to the correct colors
Avoid blockers and plan smart routes
Solve each level at your own pace

Why You‚Äôll Love It
Catch the Bear stands out with its unique mix of match, logic, and block puzzles. Every level sharpens your thinking while staying fun and calming‚Äîgreat for all ages, casual players, and puzzle lovers alike.

Core: A charming and highly polished puzzle game experience inspired by classic match-and-solve mechanics, featuring an appealing aesthetic.
Loop: The core loop focuses on progressive puzzle-solving challenges, where players must strategically complete levels and objectives to liberate collectible characters, driving long-term engagement.
Start: Highly accessible with intuitive controls and an engaging tutorial sequence, the game immediately hooks players with interesting brain-training challenges and rapid early progression.
Playgama Fact: The game is fully integrated with Playgama SDK: instant login and cross-device saves between PC and mobile. HTML5. Stable performance regardless of internet quality.
Visual: A high-quality Stylized/Cartoon art direction defined by its charming character designs and vibrant, aesthetically pleasing environments.
Key Feature: Dynamic and varied level design ensures high replayability and keeps the player experience fresh through a constantly evolving set of mechanics and challenges.
hits.howToPlayText: Slide the blocks across the board to catch the bears. Complete the level by placing all bears into their correct colored holes. hits.title: Loopvival
hits.description:
Loopvival is an atmospheric survival game with elements of roguelite, built around the mechanics of cycles.
You find yourself in a world consumed by Darkness, where the only source of light is a bonfire in the center of the map. Collect resources, boost your fire, unlock new territories, and rebuild ruined ruins to learn the story of a lost world.
Each cycle brings the world back to the beginning, but the campfire's progress and key improvements persist, gradually allowing you to move further into the Darkness. The simple action game, meditative gameplay, and gradual opening of the lore make Loopvival a short but seamless gaming experience.
hits.howToPlayText:
Darkness covered the world. You are his last hope. But for some unknown reason, the loop resets every time. And only one permanent thing in this world is a bonfire.

Your task is to break the cycle and overcome the Darkness.
- Explore the world
- Extract resources
- Rebuild the ruins - the only reminder of the past world
- Fight against the minions of Darkness.

Desctop Controls:
W,A,S,D - Movement
LMB, Space - Attack
E - Interaction
Q - Switch the resource that you add to the ruins.

Mobile Controls:
Left On-Screen Joystick - Movement
A-button - Attack
E-button - Interaction
Q-button - Switch the resource that you add to the ruins.

hits.title: Popping Candies
hits.description: Popping Candies is an exhilarating puzzle game where you can match and crush candies to achieve various objectives. Play online for free without downloading and immerse yourself in the vibrant and colorful world of candy matching. This game offers a delightful escape into a realm filled with exciting challenges, engaging gameplay, and a visually pleasing environment. As you swap adjacent candies to form rows of three or more, you'll clear them from the board and create space for more strategic moves. With the potential to create special candies like striped, wrapped, or color bombs, Popping Candies keeps you on your toes with its dynamic puzzle mechanics. Overcome obstacles such as chocolate and blockers while completing each level‚Äôs unique tasks. The catch? Your moves are limited, so plan carefully. Use boosters for extra help and advance through challenging levels to unlock new stages. Whether you're on iOS, Android, or desktop, Popping Candies offers a seamless gaming experience across all platforms, making it a perfect match for puzzle enthusiasts and casual gamers alike.
hits.howToPlayText:
Objective: The main goal is to match and crush candies to complete specific objectives within a limited number of moves.

Matching Candies: Players can swap adjacent candies to create a row or column of three or more matching candies. This will make them disappear and score points.

Objectives: Each level has its own objectives, such as reaching a certain score, collecting specific candies, or clearing jelly. Players must complete these tasks to progress.

Special Candies:

Striped Candies: Made by matching four candies in a row; they clear an entire row or column when matched.
Wrapped Candies: Made by matching five candies in a T or L shape; they explode and clear surrounding candies.
Color Bombs: Created by matching five candies of the same color; they clear all candies of that color when combined with any candy.
Obstacles: Some levels include obstacles like chocolate, jelly, and blockers that players must clear to achieve their objectives.

Moves and Lives: Players have a limited number of moves to complete a level. If they run out of moves, they lose a life. Players start with five lives and can earn more over time or purchase them.

Boosters: Players can use boosters to gain advantages, such as extra moves, special candy combinations, or clearing obstacles.

Progression: Successfully completing levels allows players to advance through the map, unlocking new levels and challenges.

hits.title: Draw Bridge - Brain Game
hits.description:
Draw Bridge - Brain Game is an exciting and challenging brain game that will put your problem-solving skills to the test. In this bridge-building adventure, your task is to draw paths for the car to safely navigate through obstacles and reach its destination. Get ready to embark on a thrilling journey of bridge construction and puzzle-solving as you draw roads to rescue the stranded car!
Core: A highly engaging physics-based puzzle runner where players must dynamically construct bridges to guide their vehicle across challenging environments.
Loop: Player progression is centered on horizontal customization. Successfully clearing unique levels rewards players with soft currency, which can be spent on acquiring new vehicle cosmetics, skins, and dynamic exhaust animations. There is no vertical stat progression, emphasizing skill-based puzzle-solving and aesthetic collection.
Start: Features immediately intuitive and accessible controls, ensuring a minimal friction onboarding process and allowing players to quickly engage with the core creative mechanic.
Playgama Fact: The game is fully integrated with Playgama SDK: instant login and cross-device saves between PC and mobile. HTML5. Stable performance regardless of internet quality.
Visual: Presented in a classic and accessible 2D visual style.
Key Feature: Offers exceptional player agency through the core build mechanic, allowing for creative, non-linear solutions to complex, multi-stage levels, fostering high replayability and creative engagement.
hits.howToPlayText:
- Touch the screen to start drawing.
- Hold and drag across to make the shapes you want.
- Once you finish, release your finger and the car will run.

hits.title: Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House
hits.description:
Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House is a dark point-and-click adventure available on both web and Android.

You wake up in a locked, unfamiliar house. The windows are sealed, the doors are bolted, and it doesn‚Äôt take long to realize you‚Äôre not here by choice ‚Äî you‚Äôve been kidnapped. The only way forward is to explore, uncover clues, and piece together who lives here‚Ä¶ and why they‚Äôve trapped you.

Every object can hide a secret: a sofa may conceal something beneath its cushions, a flowerpot may hold a key, or a book on the shelf may reveal disturbing truths about the strange girl who owns this place. Interacting with the environment unlocks new paths, changes the protagonist‚Äôs perception, and pushes the story into darker territory.

As in every classic point-and-click adventure, you‚Äôll collect items and use them in clever ways to solve puzzles, repair devices, and access new rooms. A simple glass of water, a sharp knife, or a roll of tape could be the difference between staying trapped forever and finding your way to freedom.

The narrative unfolds gradually, shifting from calm exploration to mounting dread. What begins as a harmless search of a living room turns into a chilling discovery of obsessions, sinister secrets, and unsettling mannequins that seem far too lifelike.

Your ultimate goal is clear: escape the house before it‚Äôs too late. But as you progress, you‚Äôll uncover more about the girl‚Äôs twisted hobbies ‚Äî and the terrifying fate that might await you if you fail.

Will you outsmart her and unlock the final door to freedom, or become just another part of her dark collection?
hits.howToPlayText: Explore the house by tapping on objects, collect useful items, combine them to solve puzzles, and uncover secrets that lead you closer to escaping.

hits.title: Scale the wheels
hits.description:
The game where size matters! Your mission is to change the size of the wheels, transitioning from small to large and vice versa, to overcome a variety of obstacles and progress through levels. But that's not all! The size of the wheels also affects the speed of your car, adding excitement to the gameplay.

With over 30 different tracks to conquer, you'll face unique challenges. Additionally, you can upgrading your acceleration, enabling you to jump farther and collect more coins at the end of each level. So, resize your wheels, and embark on the exhilarating journey to earn the highest score and become a true champion!
hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to reach the finish line. To do this, use the slider in the game to change the size of the wheels.

Small wheels allow you to accelerate. Large wheels allow you to drive into high obstacles, but because of them the car becomes slow. Also, the larger the wheels, the more the car turns into the standard position if it is not standing on all wheels at the moment.

If you get stuck, try to drastically change the size of the wheels, so the car can bounce.

In some levels, it is important to gain speed in order to hit an obstacle.

If you realize that the car is stuck, stopped and does not move even when you change the size of the wheels, then use the restart button of the level and try to pass it again.

Pump up the acceleration level so that at the end of the level the car can jump as far as possible and earn as many coins as possible.

Control on all platforms using the game interface.

hits.howToPlayText: A round of domino is played until one player places all of their tiles or until the game is blocked and neither player can make a move. At the beginning the players receive 7 tiles and the one with higher double begins the game. If neither player got a double, then the player with the highest tile begins. The player who earns 100 points first wins.

hits.title: Gas Station - Stick Simulator
hits.description:

Over time, your gas station will grow into a true empire: with a store, restroom, cafe, and even a hot dog delivery service. The more customers, the more profit, upgrades, and fun!

Oversee your business, upgrade your stations, and hire employees to keep everything running smoothly. Even when you're offline, your gas station continues to earn! This isn't just a simulator‚Äîit's your path to success and the fun of managing your own mini-empire.

‚õΩ Upgrade your gas station and service more cars
üçî Cook hot dogs and open a cozy cafe
üõí Add a store and restroom for customers
üí∏ Earn money even when you're not playing
üèÜ Become the ultimate gas station boss!
hits.howToPlayText: The goal of the game is to start with a small gas station and gradually grow it into a profitable empire. Maintain cars, upgrade equipment, build a store, cafe, and restroom, hire employees, and earn more and more money to become the boss of all gas stations!

hits.title: Moto X3M Spooky Land
hits.description:
Moto X3M: Spooky Land is a spooky Halloween edition of the popular bike racing series. Put on your helmet, hop on your motorbike, and ride through haunted tracks filled with creepy traps, bone-made obstacles, and eerie surprises. Speed is key ‚Äì beat the clock while avoiding deadly hazards and pulling off flips to save precious time!

The controls are simple ‚Äì use the arrow keys to accelerate, brake, and tilt your bike for smooth landings. Each of the 32 levels introduces new spooky challenges, making the game both thrilling and tricky. For fans of off-road biking and Halloween fun, Moto X3M: Spooky Land is the perfect ride!
hits.howToPlayText:
WASD or ARROWS 
Press the up arrow key to accelerate
Balance your bike with the left and right arrow keys
Break by pressing the down arrow key
Perform flips and other stunts to gain time
Don't crash

hits.title: Obby: Ragdoll Boxing
hits.description:
Immerse yourself in Ragdoll boxing chaos and fun with Obby!

This is a unique simulator that combines ragdoll physics and crazy fights! Here you control not just a fighter, but a real rag doll, who will have to go through trials in the arena, in training and in improvised fights. Funny animation, unpredictable behavior and collision physics turn every fight into an exciting spectacle.

Create your own character, explore locations and prove who is the best boxer among Obby fighters. Control punches, dodge and hit with precise calculation - or just enjoy the chaotic fun, watching your characters fly around the arena.

üîë Key features of the game:
ü•ä Ragdoll physics - every hit is unpredictable
üéÆ Simple controls with deep gameplay
üßç Character customization
üß† Elements of strategy and reaction
üòÇ Fun and unexpected situations in every fight
üåç Various locations and arenas for battles
hits.howToPlayText:
The goal of the game:
Win battles, controlling a ragdoll fighter with ragdoll physics, pass tests in arenas, improve skills and become the strongest Obby boxer.

hits.title: Crime and Vice City Police
hits.description:
Switch to different cars and drive around the city with a bunch of other cars and the police.
- Many different locations: Urban city, hills, crash test tracks, etc.
- Online Multiplayer!
- Tuning system.
- Destruction of the car.

There will be other cars on the city highway that can be broken! Complete deformation of the transport and realistic collisions.

Arrange a crash test of cars and watch their destruction in slow motion. All the destruction of cars has a realistic simulation.

Core: An accessible, open-world driving and street racing simulator focused on high-speed action and drifting.
Loop: Players begin by selecting their preferred driving map and immediately jump into the action. The core loop revolves around competitive racing and expressive drifting across diverse urban environments, with no complex progression systems (no ""leveling"" or ""upgrades"" required).
Start: The game features intuitive controls and simple onboarding. Players are immediately hooked by the straightforward menu allowing them to select a map and start driving and drifting freely.
Playgama Fact: The game is fully integrated with Playgama SDK: instant login and cross-device saves between PC and mobile. HTML5. Stable performance regardless of internet quality.
Visual: Distinctive Low Poly aesthetic, ensuring broad accessibility and smooth performance across devices while offering stylized visual appeal.
Key Feature: Dynamic multiplayer interaction and an unlimited, free-to-use car tuning system, allowing players to instantly customize multiple vehicle models and engage in competitive street drifting and racing.
hits.howToPlayText:
Controls:
TAB - pause menu (or Escape)

Moving W (forward), S (backward), A (left), D (right).
Spacebar - handbrake.
Shift - nitro.
C - change camera.
R - reset car.
K - restore car.
B - slow down time.
N - switch car.

For mobile devices, use the game interface.

hits.title: Happy Glass - Draw to Fill
hits.description: Happy Glass: Draw to Fill is a creative and relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to fill a happy glass with water ‚Äî but there's a twist! You must draw lines and shapes to guide the water flow into the glass. Think strategically, draw creatively, and use physics to your advantage as you solve increasingly challenging levels. The game features colorful visuals, satisfying animations, and a joyful glass that smiles only when full. Whether you're a fan of brain teasers or just love doodling your way through clever puzzles, this game is sure to entertain and test your ingenuity.
hits.howToPlayText: Use your finger or mouse to draw lines or shapes on the screen. These drawings will act as paths, ramps, or barriers to guide the water into the glass. The goal is to fill the glass above the dashed line without spilling too much water. Think carefully and use your imagination to solve each level ‚Äî and don‚Äôt forget, the glass only smiles when it‚Äôs full!

hits.title: Mike Lost In Desert - Hidden Object
hits.description:
Mike Lost in Desert ‚Äì Hidden Object

After a sudden engine failure, Mike was forced to make an emergency landing in the middle of an endless desert. His plane is destroyed, his supplies are running out, and dangerous bandits are on his trail.

Wandering under the burning sun, Mike must search for useful items, explore mysterious ruins, and survive against all odds. Each discovery brings him one step closer to salvation or to his doom.

Will he find civilization before the desert claims his life, or will the bandits reach him first?

Features:
Find hidden objects in beautifully hand-painted desert locations.
Follow a story of survival and determination.
Immerse yourself in the calm but tense atmosphere of the desert.

Can you help Mike survive the unforgiving sands and find his way back to safety?
hits.howToPlayText:
You have about 8 minutes to make your escape through five desert locations.
In each location, you must find 10 hidden objects before moving on to the next area.

If the time runs out, the bandits will catch you.
If you manage to find all the objects in all five locations before the time ends, you will escape the desert and survive.

Search carefully, stay focused, and move quickly. Your life depends on it.

hits.title: Idle Supermarket Tycoon
hits.description: Embark on a journey to become a retail mogul with Idle Supermarket Tycoon. This engaging online simulation game lets you transform a modest shopping mall into a bustling retail empire. Strategically develop new shops, enhance their interiors, and beautify the mall's exterior. Your mission: serve customers, boost your reputation, and watch your profits soar. Play for free on your phone or computer and experience the thrill of managing your own supermarket kingdom
hits.howToPlayText:
You have a Shopping mall at your disposal, which you need to develop by acquiring new shops and outfitting them, as well as improving the exterior and interior of the entire Shopping mall.

Serve customers, earn money and reputation. Invest your profits into your Shopping mall, and distribute reputation points among visitors. Assign priority customers to each shop in your mall. This way, you can maximize profits from serving them!

Purchase delivery vehicles to earn additional income from each completed trip. Don't forget to monitor the corridors, as trash cans or vending machines might get clogged.

If you're unsure what to do next, you can always refer to the missions. Complete them to earn valuable rewards and expand your Shopping mall, your grand Supermarket!



Controls:
Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI
Plus and minus keys = change the size of the camera

hits.title: Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge - Horror Escape
hits.description:
Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge ‚Äì Horror Escape is the chilling sequel to the cult classic point-and-click horror game.
After managing to escape once, Grandma has found you again ‚Äî and this time, she‚Äôs locked you in an even darker, more twisted place.
Explore eerie rooms, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover cursed objects and grotesque clues.
Use your logic and courage to find tools, unlock hidden paths, and perform a disturbing ritual to escape.
Every item has a purpose, every detail tells a story ‚Äî and Grandma is always watching.
Will you manage to escape again, or will you become her next ritual offering?
Perfect for fans of horror, escape rooms, and point-and-click adventures.
hits.howToPlayText:
This is a classic point-and-click adventure with a first-person view.
You don‚Äôt move around freely ‚Äî instead, you explore each scene from a fixed perspective.
Click on objects to examine them, collect useful items, and use them in the right places to solve puzzles and progress through the story.
Every interaction matters, so pay attention to details and think logically to escape.

hits.title: Click Click Clicker
hits.description: Click Click Clicker defines the idle clicker genre, offering engaging gameplay where players accumulate wealth by clicking a button. As you advance, you can unlock different buttons, cursors, themes, and music. This free game is available on mobile devices and computers, providing fun for all.
hits.howToPlayText:
Click Click Clicker is as true to the clicker genre as it gets. You‚Äôre clicking a button to click another button. Click the button, upgrade your abilities, and get shiny new buttons for your hard work.

Like many clicker games, you start with one humble click. With each click, you generate cash to buy upgrades. Those upgrades include an increase in your passive ability to earn money, the amount of cash you earn per click, or the number of cursors you have.

Click Click Clicker is all about getting shiny new things with minimal effort. You can customize everything in this game: backgrounds, music, cursor, and buttons. But you have to put in the work to unlock them first! Keep clicking or coast along on your idle earnings until you get there.

hits.title: Master Checkers
hits.description: Play Checkers, the classic two-player board game! Make diagonal moves, eliminate opponents, and crown your piece as a king. Challenge the computer, a local player, or opponents worldwide in this exciting Italian Checkers version!
hits.howToPlayText:
Moves are only allowed on dark squares, so pieces always move diagonally. Single pieces are always restricted to moving forward (towards the opponent).
Capture pieces by jumping.
A piece that makes a capture (jump) jumps over one of the opponent's pieces and lands in a straight diagonal line on the other side. Only one piece can be captured in one jump; however, multiple jumps are allowed in one move.
Jumps (or captures) are mandatory.
If a player can make a capture, the jump must be made.

When a piece reaches the furthest row from the player who controls it, it becomes a king and can move either forward or backward.

hits.title: The Road Home: Granny Escape
hits.description:
The Road Home: Granny Escape is a terrifying 3D horror survival game where your only goal is to escape a haunted house filled with danger, puzzles, and fear. You're not here by accident ‚Äî Granny and Grandpa brought you here on purpose, and they won‚Äôt let you go easily.

üïØ The Story
Your trip home took a dark turn. While riding a bus through a remote forest, a massive tree crashed down onto the road. You stepped out to investigate‚Ä¶ and everything went black.

You wake up in a locked, eerie house. The windows are boarded up. The doors are sealed. And something is watching you. You soon realize the terrifying truth: you‚Äôve been kidnapped and trapped by an evil Granny and her mad husband.

This isn‚Äôt just a place ‚Äî it‚Äôs a prison designed to break you.

üéØ What You Must Do
-Explore the dark and haunted house
-Solve puzzles and unlock secret passages
-Craft useful items from the resources you find
-Avoid Granny and Grandpa ‚Äî they can hear your every move
-Survive deadly traps and unpredictable chases
-Make your way to freedom before it‚Äôs too late

‚öôÔ∏è Game Features
-A chilling 3D horror experience with immersive atmosphere
-Evil and intelligent enemies who react to sound and movement
-Multiple escape paths and secret endings
-A full crafting system: collect, combine, survive
-Puzzles, keys, locked rooms, and hidden objects
-A heavy dose of mental horror and psychological tension
-Every sound matters. Every choice counts.

‚ùóÔ∏è Not Just a Game ‚Äî A Nightmare
This isn‚Äôt just a scary house ‚Äî it‚Äôs a living nightmare. There‚Äôs evil in the walls, and death behind every corner. Will you outsmart your captors, or will fear consume you?

Use your brain, stay quiet, and find your way out‚Ä¶ if you still can.

Download The Road Home: Granny Escape ‚Äî and see if you have what it takes to survive the fear, escape the madness, and get back home.
hits.howToPlayText:
WASD ‚Äî Move
C ‚Äî Crouch
Space ‚Äî Jump

The main goal is to escape from the old people's house. Find useful items and use them to your advantage.

hits.description:
‚Ä¢ Slow-motion

‚úèÔ∏è WORD FROM IMAGE

hits.howToPlayText:
üïπÔ∏è HOW TO PLAY:

hits.title: EdgeFire 2
hits.description:
EdgeFire 2 is a large‚Äîscale and multifaceted game universe offering a deep reinterpretation of the classic formulas of the genre.

If you are familiar with the unique atmosphere of the iconic Counter-Strike 1.6, have you followed the constant evolution of the gameplay in CS:GO and its successor CS 2, enjoy the intense and mobile battles in Standoff 2 or immerse yourself in any other of the numerous cult projects of the genre ‚Äî you will find in this game the magic of the classics, recognizable at first glance.

EdgeFire 2 offers its players a unique and balanced fusion of nostalgic "old school" and bold new ideas, where genuine tactical depth and the need for team synergy are seamlessly combined with an exciting, dynamic and visually spectacular action game.

This combination creates an ideal, carefully calibrated space for infinitely diverse competitive battles, where each match becomes a new story.
hits.howToPlayText:
WASD - movement
R - recharge
LMB - shot
Esc - pause menu

To rise to the top and put your name in the pantheon of legends of this game, it's not enough just to destroy your opponents. You must dominate every encounter, demonstrating unconditional superiority. 

Excellence starts with you. Demonstrate lightning-fast reactions and impeccable accuracy, honing your skills to shine. Every shot must be deliberate, every movement must be measured.

Only an impeccable combination of deadly weapon mastery and ingenious tactical calculation will open the way for you to eternal glory. Strength without thought is blind, and strategy without courage is fruitless. Only fusing them together in the crucible of battle will harden your will and elevate you to a pedestal from which you will be remembered for centuries. The arena is waiting for its champion.

hits.title: TRAFFIC JAM ESCAPE 3D
hits.description:
Clear the roads in Traffic Jam Escape 3D! Solve challenging traffic puzzles, free cars from gridlock, and master the art of strategic driving.

Get ready to play Traffic Jam Escape 3D, the addictive mobile traffic puzzle game where you control chaotic city streets and free cars from gridlock! Every second counts - one smart move can clear the road, one mistake can block it forever. Are you skilled enough to guide every car out of the jam?

In Traffic Jam Escape 3D, your goal is simple but challenging: tap cars, follow the arrows, and plan their path to freedom. Avoid collisions, dodge obstacles, and keep traffic moving smoothly. With each level, timing and strategy become even more important - one wrong move could create a crash and block the way.

Every stage offers a brand-new challenge. You‚Äôll need to think ahead, plan the order of moves, and figure out the best escape route for each vehicle. From narrow alleys to busy intersections, the puzzles get tougher and more exciting as you progress.

Featuring a wide variety of vehicles - from tiny cars to large trucks - you‚Äôll need to adapt your strategy to guide each one safely out of the mess. The more you play, the sharper your skills become as you conquer increasingly complex traffic jams.

Key Features of Traffic Jam Escape 3D:
Challenging traffic jam escape puzzles at every level
Intuitive tap-and-guide controls for all ages
Dynamic gameplay with busy intersections, narrow roads, and tricky obstacles
Dozens of levels with increasing difficulty to keep you hooked
Vibrant graphics and realistic sound effects for an immersive experience
Traffic Jam Escape isn‚Äôt just about clearing the streets‚Äîit‚Äôs about mastering the art of smart maneuvering. Dodge oncoming traffic, weave through tight spaces, and avoid obstacles at every turn. With dozens of levels to conquer, the game offers a constant challenge and endless fun.

hits.title: Uncle Hit: Punch the Dummy
hits.description:
Uncle Hit: Punch the Dummy is a fast-paced, casual action game where you let out your frustration on a few dummies in all sorts of scenarios. You will need quick reflexes and punches to unleash the blows it will take to knock your opponent out. Stay sharp, keep punching, and enjoy every moment of cathartic stress relief.
How to Play Uncle Hit: Punch the Dummy
Uncle Hit: Punch the Dummy is simple on the surface and fairly easy to play, but that is exactly what makes it so addictive. You control a floating arm wearing a boxing glove, and your only mission is to punch every dummy you see, along with other objects. Move the glove, line up your swings, and knock the targets out of the scene. Once they are all knocked out, you can move to the next level.
Each level presents a new setup of dummies. Sometimes there is a single dummy sitting quietly on a bench. Other times, groups are standing together, chatting, dancing with a rat, posing like the Creation of Adam, typing at a computer, balancing on unicycles, or even a bunch of dummies carrying a casket. The variety keeps things surprising and funny as you move from one level to the next.
hits.howToPlayText:
There is no strict progression or difficulty curve. Some levels are very simple, while others require a bit more timing. The game runs on physics, so punches can have dramatic chain reactions. You might knock two or three dummies aside with one well-placed swing. There is no timer, no pressure, and no limit to how long you can play. The focus is pure fun. Punch the dummies, enjoy the chaos, and move on to the next scene!

Click on the screen to punch the annoying dummies.

hits.title: Heroes of the Dungeons: Match-3 RPG
hits.description:
Collect legendary heroes, defeat invading monsters, and rebuild a fallen kingdom ‚Äî one match at a time!
A mysterious gate has unleashed evil creatures across the land, cutting the realm off from the outside world. As the Master of Hunters, you‚Äôre the last hope. Match gems to unleash powerful attacks, trigger epic combos, and use hero skills at the perfect moment. Loot treasures from battles, upgrade shops in your castle, and bring prosperity back to the kingdom!
Core: A unique match-3 RPG experience where players strategically match colored gems to trigger distinct in-game actions, such as performing an attack on an enemy or healing the party.
Loop: Player progression centers around extensive character development. Players must clear stages, defeat powerful bosses, and unlock chests to earn tokens, which are then used to upgrade character attributes like maximum health, attack power, and healing efficiency.
Start: The game features a streamlined onboarding tutorial, ensuring high accessibility and a low barrier to entry, providing players with an immediately engaging and enjoyable experience from the outset.
Playgama Fact: The game is fully integrated with Playgama SDK: instant login and cross-device saves between PC and mobile. HTML5. Stable performance regardless of internet quality.
Visual: Features a high-quality Stylized / Cartoon art direction.
Key Feature: A narrative-driven experience offering deep complexity, a rich cast of characters, and highly varied gameplay mechanics, focusing on the core gem-matching combat system where different colored gems trigger diverse tactical outcomes like attacks, ensuring deep replayability.
hits.howToPlayText:
- Match 3+ tiles to attack enemies and charge your team‚Äôs skills.
- Swap adjacent tiles to create combos and special blocks for massive damage.
- Use hero abilities when they‚Äôre ready to target enemy weaknesses and turn the battle around.
- Win the fight to earn loot and materials.
- Upgrade castle shops with your rewards to boost income and strengthen your heroes for the next stages.

hits.title: Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon
hits.description: Embark on a journey to build your own empire in Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon, an engaging online economic simulator that combines elements of resource crafting, empire development, and clicker gameplay. As the ruler of a thriving island, your mission is to explore every corner, uncover precious resources, and craft them into valuable goods. hits.howToPlayText:
Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon is an economic simulator, time-killer, combining elements of empire development, resource crafting, and clicker gameplay. You play as a ruler tasked to explore the island, sending expeditions to discover new resources and crafting them. Hire managers and traders to handle the daily tasks and bring additional profits to your empire. Upgrade factories with resources and maintain a balance of production for finished goods. Fulfill production orders and earn valuable rewards.

Explore the island and uncover all the resources needed to make your empire so great that everyone in this fantastic world will know about it!



‚Ä¢ Go through the introductory training, which will explain how the production of goods works, how new regions of the island are opened, and how the process of exploring and discovering new resources works.
‚Ä¢ To earn money, produce resources at factories. After production is completed, the finished product can be sold. Improve factories, produce more goods, and earn more profit.
‚Ä¢ You need to equip and send expeditions (invest the necessary resources and goods) to open up new regions of the island.
‚Ä¢ To discover new resources, go to the research center and purchase the explored resources.
‚Ä¢ To obtain additional profit or automate some actions (such as selling finished products), hire managers and traders

hits.description:
Weapons Merge Hero is a fast-paced 2D merge action game where precision and strategy matter.
Merge weapons of the same level to create stronger knives, power up your hero, and destroy strange planet-like enemies.

During gameplay, the hero fights using knives only.
Throw knives into round, planet-shaped enemies and keep hitting them until they explode. Each successful hit brings you closer to victory, but timing and upgrades are key.

Merge identical weapons to increase knife damage, speed, and power. As enemies get tougher, only the strongest merged weapons will survive.

Simple controls, satisfying explosions, and endless action make Weapons Merge Hero easy to play and hard to put down.

Upgrade Your Power

Your hero throws knives at round, planet-like enemies.

Destroy the Target
Keep hitting the enemy with knives until it explodes.

Progress & Repeat
Face stronger enemies and keep merging to survive longer.

hits.title: Solitaire Klondike - Treasure Island
hits.description: Dive into the exciting adventure of Solitaire Klondike - Treasure Island, where pirates and treasures await. Help a brave heroine uncover her father''s hidden fortune while outsmarting relentless foes, all set against stunning visuals and captivating animations.
hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to arrange all the cards into four piles according to suit: from Ace to King. Start with aces, then twos, threes, and so on until you reach the king.

On the game board, you can move cards between seven piles. You can only start a new pile with a king. You can place a card of a different color and one unit of lower value on a card in the stack. Groups of cards with alternating colors and ranks can be dragged between stacks, adding tactical depth.

You can review the deck an unlimited number of times, giving you the opportunity to carefully consider each move. The game ends when all the cards are neatly placed in piles.

Test your skills in this exciting solitaire card game and enjoy every victory!

hits.title: Jigsolitaire Puzzle
hits.description:
Jigsoltaire - Free Online Jigsaw Puzzle Game

Play Jigsoltaire free online! Solve beautiful jigsaw puzzles, complete daily challenges, unlock collections, and compete on leaderboards. No download required.


Jigsoltaire is a relaxing free-to-play jigsaw puzzle game that brings the classic puzzle experience to your browser. Drag and swap tiles to rebuild beautiful images across multiple themed collections including Classic, Travel, Animals, and Fun categories.

Key Features:
- Daily Puzzles: New puzzle every day with bonus coin rewards
- Multiple Collections: Unlock Classic, Travel, Animals, and Fun puzzle packs
- 7 Difficulty Levels: From Easy (3x3) to Legendary (9x9) - perfect for beginners and experts
- Quest System: Complete challenges to earn coins and track your progress
- Leaderboards: Compete with players worldwide for the highest scores
- Custom Puzzles: Upload your own photos to create personalized puzzles
- Gallery: Save and view all your completed masterpieces
- VIP Mode: Ad-free experience for uninterrupted puzzle enjoyment
- Hint System: Get help when you're stuck
- Multi-language Support: Available in English, Russian, and Turkish

Why Play Jigsoltaire?
- No download or installation required
- Works on desktop and mobile devices
- Relaxing background music and sound effects
- Progress saves automatically
- Free to play with optional purchases

Perfect for puzzle lovers, casual gamers, and anyone looking for a relaxing way to unwind. Challenge your mind, improve your focus, and enjoy hours of puzzle-solving fun!
hits.howToPlayText:
HOW TO PLAY JIGSOLTAIRE

OBJECTIVE:
Rebuild the scrambled image by swapping tiles until all pieces are in their correct positions.

BASIC CONTROLS:
- Drag a tile and drop it onto another tile to swap their positions
- Continue swapping until the complete image is revealed
- The puzzle is solved when all tiles are in the correct order

GAME MODES:

1. Play Level
   - Progress through levels in your current collection
   - Each level increases in difficulty
   - Earn coins and points for completion

2. Daily Puzzle
   - New puzzle available every day
   - Complete for bonus coins (+50)
   - Track your daily streak


DIFFICULTY LEVELS:
- Easy: 3x3 grid (9 pieces)
- Medium: 4x4 grid (16 pieces)
- Hard: 5x5 grid (25 pieces)
- Expert: 6x6 grid (36 pieces)
- Master: 7x7 grid (49 pieces)
- Insane: 8x8 grid (64 pieces)
- Legendary: 9x9 grid (81 pieces)

TIPS FOR SUCCESS:
1. Start with corner and edge pieces
2. Look for distinctive colors or patterns
3. Use the Hint button if you get stuck
4. Take your time - there's no time pressure
5. Complete easier puzzles first to earn hints

FEATURES:
- Hints: Tap the hint button to highlight a correct swap
- Gallery: View all your completed puzzles
- Quests: Complete challenges for bonus rewards
- Collections: Unlock new puzzle packs
- Leaderboard: Compare scores with other players

Enjoy the game!

Loop: Players engage in dynamic drive-by shootouts, utilizing precise aiming to disable enemy vehicles or neutralize opponents. Progression is driven by a bounty system, rewarding players with in-game currency based on the successful elimination of enemy streaks.

Start: Instant immersion and high engagement from the very beginning, ensuring strong early player retention.

Playgama Fact: The game is fully integrated with Playgama SDK: instant login and cross-device saves between PC and mobile. HTML5. Stable performance regardless of internet quality.

Visual: Realistic visual style leveraging unconventional camera angles and sophisticated physics-based engine for authentic vehicular movement and dynamic, surprising gameplay scenarios.

Key Feature: Unique aerial perspective combined with realistic physics simulation, delivering unpredictable action and a fresh take on the combat driving genre.

hits.title: Maths Puzzle
hits.description: Maths Puzzle is a fun and engaging logic-based game that challenges your mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities. With a variety of puzzles that range in difficulty, this game is perfect for anyone looking to improve their mental agility and enjoy a fun, educational experience. Your task is to solve mathematical equations by figuring out the missing numbers, symbols, or operations in order to make both sides of the equation equal. The puzzles come with increasing complexity, so you‚Äôll need both strategy and quick thinking to succeed.
hits.howToPlayText:
Objective: Your goal is to solve the math puzzle by filling in the missing numbers or operations to make the equation correct.

Start the Game: Click on the puzzle to begin. You‚Äôll be presented with an equation that is missing some parts (numbers or operators).

Solve the Puzzle: Use your knowledge of basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division) to complete the puzzle. You may need to fill in missing numbers or choose the correct mathematical operators to balance both sides of the equation.

Hints: If you're stuck, some versions of the game offer hints that help guide you towards the solution. Use them wisely to avoid wasting moves.

Levels: As you progress, the difficulty will increase. New challenges such as more complex equations or multiple missing elements will keep you on your toes.

Time and Scoring: Depending on the version of the game, you may be timed, so solving the puzzles quickly could earn you more points or rewards.

Winning the Game: Successfully solve a series of puzzles to move to the next level. Keep going to challenge your brain and improve your math skills.

hits.title: Mini Golf Battle
hits.description:
Mini Golf Battle is a fun and casual mini golf challenge where your goal is simple: hit the ball into the hole with as few shots as possible. The game combines easy controls with tricky levels full of slopes, angles, and obstacles that test your timing and precision.
Each level is designed to get a little harder, so you‚Äôll need to aim carefully, control your shot power, and plan the best path to sink the ball. It‚Äôs a relaxing yet addictive golf experience made for quick play sessions.
hits.howToPlayText:
Drag/swipe in the direction you want the ball to move.
Pull back and release to adjust the strength of your shot.
The longer you drag, the stronger the hit.
Try to sink the ball into the hole in the fewest strokes possible.
Watch out for walls, ramps, and barriers that can deflect your ball.
Use angles to bounce around corners smartly.

Fire Power:
This bonus gives your ball a flaming speed boost.
It‚Äôs useful for long straight shots or when you want to quickly cross a large gap.
Best used when you need maximum distance in a single strike.

Wing / Glide Power:
This bonus allows your ball to glide smoothly as if it has wings.
It reduces friction and gives your ball a longer travel path with better control.
Ideal for precision shots where you want distance but also don‚Äôt want to overshoot too wildly.

Spring / Bounce Power:
This bonus acts like a spring-loaded push.
It helps your ball bounce forward with extra force, perfect for overcoming obstacles or making tricky jumps.
Best for courses with barriers, ramps, or platforms where normal shots can‚Äôt reach.

hits.howToPlayText:

- Dodge Obstacles: Timing is key! Pass through the gaps in the pipes. Hitting a pipe or the ground ends the game.
- Use Power-ups: Collect items like the Shield (protection), Magnet (attract coins), and 2x Score to help you survive and rank up.
Controls:
- Desktop: Press Spacebar or Left Mouse Button to fly.
- Mobile: Tap anywhere on the screen to fly.

hits.title: Club Guard
hits.description:
Club Guard is a simulation game where you take on the role of a nightclub security guard. Your task is to check visitors at the entrance, find prohibited items (weapons, alcohol and other contraband items) and decide who to allow to enter and who to deny entry. The game is characterized by unusual humor, absurd situations and freedom of action: you can search people, take away their belongings, use force or even beat them if you decide that they violate the rules.

Game Features:

Interactive gameplay : Check pockets, bags and clothes of visitors to find hidden items.
Absurd humor : Each visitor is unique, with unusual dialogues and behaviors.
Freedom of action : You can be strict, fair or even ruthless - it's all up to you.
Variety of situations : From fights to strange requests, every day at the club is unpredictable.
Simple graphics : Minimalistic style and intuitive controls make the game accessible to everyone.
hits.howToPlayText: Imagine that you find yourself in the role of a nightclub security guard. Your task is to keep order, check visitors at the entrance and maintain the atmosphere of fun, without forgetting your power and responsibility. You have complete freedom of action: you decide who to let in, who to expel, and who to warn. You can also use a huge arsenal of weapons!

hits.title: Connect Line
hits.description:
Connect Lines is a puzzle game in which the goal is to rotate line-segments so that together they form a continuous connected path or network i.e. all the lines must join up into one single connected structure.
It is simple in appearance but grows challenging, because you must figure out the correct orientation of each piece so that the network is complete without any breaks.
As the puzzle advances, the arrangement / layout becomes more complex. The number of line-pieces increases, the shapes become more varied, and finding the correct connection scheme becomes harder. You may need to think ahead about how rotating one piece will affect connections with several adjacent pieces. (This is standard for these kinds of puzzles.)
hits.howToPlayText:
Connect all lines into one unified path (or network). Every piece must be connected properly so there are no loose ends.
The board has many small line segments. These might be straight lines, curves, etc. Each segment is oriented in some way.
You can click on a line piece to rotate it. Each click usually rotates the piece by 90¬∞ (or possibly another fixed amount) to change its orientation.

The goal of Bus Jam is to help the bus escape the parking jam. To do this, you need to move the other vehicles out of the way. The colorful buses will pick up the same color passengers. Let's help all bus pick up all passengers.

Desktop Controls:
Click: click on the bus select that bus in the slot to pick up passengers.

Mobile Controls:
Tap: tap on the bus select that bus in the slot to pick up passengers.

hits.title: Tile Match Puzzle
hits.description:
Are you a fan of match 3 and combination zen match games? 
Tile Match Puzzle fulfills your desire for puzzle fun with new puzzle challenges every day! Simply match three tiles to reveal even more tiles underneath. Find more combinations until you've cleared everything. But beware: If you select too many tiles without at least three matching each other, you will have to start your journey from the beginning.

Each level presents you with a new addictive puzzle challenge. Take a fun and relaxing getaway as you enter beautiful new landscapes to test your brain. 

Game features
 
Unique Tile Puzzles:
With tiles in over 20 styles, there's no limit to the number of combinations you can make. 

Flex your brain muscles
Test and improve your memory and pattern recognition skills with this fun and relaxing puzzle game!
hits.howToPlayText:
How to play Tile Match Puzzles
- Tap to place the tiles into the box. Match 3 or more of the same tiles to remove them from the puzzle board.
- Remove all tiles from the board to win the level.
- Beat each level as best as possible to win coins and collect them all!
- Complete each level to progress through your journey. Hundreds of challenging and colorful tile matching puzzles await!

hits.title: Sudoku Block Puzzle
hits.description:
Sudoku Block Puzzle is a combination of sudoku and wood block puzzle games.
It is a simple yet challenging and addictive free block puzzle you won‚Äôt be able to put down.

Match blocks to remove them by completing lines and cubes. 
Keep the board clean and beat your high score in this block puzzle! 
Watch blocks blast away as you play! 
Challenge your IQ and win the block puzzle game!

Sudoku Block Puzzle features:

‚úî 9x9 block puzzle board. Merge blocks on the 9x9 grid, which should be familiar to all sudoku fans, to build lines and squares.
‚úî Blocks of various shapes. Strategically stack blocks on the sudoku board to destroy them and keep the board clean.
‚úî Complete Daily Challenges to get unique trophies while playing block puzzles.
‚úî Combos. Master the block puzzle game by destroying multiple tiles with just one move.
‚úî Streak. Score more points by eliminating blocks with several successful moves in a row. Go full blast and destroy as many blocks as you can!
hits.howToPlayText:
1. Drag a block onto the board (blocks can't overlap).
2. Clear blocks by completing:
    - A full row
    - A full column
    - A full 3√ó3 square (Sudoku-style)
3. The game ends when all blocks can't fit anywhere on the board.

hits.title: Cup Quest
hits.description:
Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey: A Feline Hero‚Äôs Adventure Begins!

Join a brave cat on an epic quest in Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey, a fresh twist on the classic balls-and-cups game. This isn't just about tossing balls into cups‚Äîit's a full-blown adventure packed with clever puzzles, physics-based challenges, and one courageous kitty determined to save the day.

Your Cat, the Hero
Meet your furry champion‚Äîa quick-thinking, nimble cat with a heart of gold. As danger looms and traps lie in wait, it‚Äôs up to this whiskered warrior to take on wild levels filled with spinning platforms, explosives, and tricky obstacles.

Precision Meets Puzzle
Each level is a test of aim and timing. Launch the ball just right, bounce it off the environment, and land it perfectly in the cup. It‚Äôs not just about power‚Äîsuccess requires strategy, finesse, and a little creative thinking.
 What Awaits You
- Over 200 unique levels, ranging from simple to seriously tricky
- Skill-based gameplay that mixes timing, puzzle-solving, and action
- Hero upgrades: unlock new feline champions and grow stronger as you progress
- Satisfying animations and smooth physics that make every throw feel great
- Enemies and traps: it's not just puzzles‚Äîyou‚Äôll have to outsmart swarm enemies too

Become a Cup Champion
Explore a magical world where every level brings new challenges. Battle your way through enemy swarms, master the art of the perfect shot, and rise as the legendary hero of the cup realm.

Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey isn‚Äôt just a puzzle game‚Äîit‚Äôs a heartwarming, skill-testing adventure that‚Äôll keep you coming back for more. Grab your paws, line up your shot, and get ready to become a legend.

hits.description:
Join an exciting multiplayer maze adventure! Team up with friends to explore tricky mazes full of secrets, funny messages, cool prizes, and hidden paths!

Pick awesome character skins and cute pets to join you! Dodge silly AI monsters and funny NPCs that make your journey fun!

Easy controls let you use doors, levers, buttons, and keys to escape! Each maze has colorful places, sneaky traps and puzzles.

Jump into magical portals and discover new maze adventures! Chat, laugh, and escape in your-styled universe !

The goal: get to the end.

Control:
WASD - movement.
Space bar - jump.
TAB - pause.
E - Interact.
Shift - cursor.
Mouse wheel - zoom in/out.

On the phone:
Use the game interface.

hits.description:

Slide colorful cards and uncover stunning HD jigsaw graphics on mobile. 
Whether you're looking for fantasy jigsaw puzzles for free, a smooth slide puzzle game for the Christmas countdown, or engaging Christmas games, this jigsolitaire game has it all.
hits.howToPlayText:
Slide cards anywhere! Just press and drag a card to move it.
When cards with matching patterns touch each other, they automatically lock together, and you can move the whole connected group as one piece it's that easy!
Be careful with tricky placements that might break your groups apart, especially during the fast paced Christmas countdown mode.

hits.title: Groomy Island
hits.description:
Groomy Island - is a brand new realistic horror-survival game in 3D Island that Your sole objective is Survive and collect all the 10 Grimace Shake.
- There are many enjoyable places to explore on a large island.
- Make sure to keep an eye on a MiniMap to navigate around.

Core: A compelling first-person survival horror experience centered on high-stakes stealth and object retrieval.
Loop: Players engage in a tense evasion-and-search mechanic, navigating environments to find hidden collectibles while actively avoiding an immediate predatory threat.
Start: Instant player engagement is ensured through an immediate and intuitive 'hook,' providing compelling interest from the very first minute of gameplay.
Playgama Fact: The game is fully integrated with Playgama SDK. HTML5. Stable performance regardless of internet quality.
Visual: Features a highly immersive, Realistic visual design to enhance environmental dread and player connection to the experience.
Key Feature: A unique, light-touch horror approach that distinguishes it from traditional genre titles, offering a novel blend of tension and accessibility for a broader audience.
hits.howToPlayText:
WASD to Move
Shift to Run
Space to Jump/Start
ESC to Pause/Resume
Q to Close
Avoid the Grimace and keep drinking
