hits.howToPlayText:
üç™ COOKIE TYCOON - HOW TO PLAY üéÆ
üìñ COMPLETE GAMEPLAY GUIDE

üéØ GETTING STARTED
Your First Steps
Welcome to Cookie Tycoon! You start with nothing but a dream and a giant cookie button. Your goal? Build a cookie empire from scratch and become a millionaire!
Step 1: Click the Cookie! üç™
Tap the giant cookie button in the center of your screen. Each click produces fresh cookies. This is your primary way to earn in the early game!
Step 2: Understand the Currency System üí∞

Cookies = Your raw production resource
Money = Your purchasing power (10 Cookies = 1 Dollar)
Convert cookies to money strategically to buy upgrades and automation!


‚öôÔ∏è CORE GAME MECHANICS
üñ±Ô∏è CLICKING & UPGRADES
Manual Production:

Click the cookie button repeatedly to earn cookies
Each click gives you a base amount of cookies
Your click power increases as you upgrade!

Upgrade Your Clicking:
Navigate to the Upgrades Menu to:

Increase cookies per click
Unlock multipliers
Boost overall production efficiency

üí° Pro Tip: Invest heavily in click upgrades early - they compound over time!

ü§ñ AUTOMATION SYSTEM
Stop clicking manually! Purchase auto ovens that produce cookies automatically:
1. Simple Auto Oven (First Purchase)

Your entry-level automation
Produces cookies passively every second
Can be upgraded to increase production speed
Strategy: Buy this as soon as possible!

2. Auto Oven Program (Mid-Game)

Regional production system
Significantly faster than Simple Auto Oven
Multiple upgrade levels available
Strategy: Stack multiple units for exponential growth!

3. Advanced Auto Oven Program (End-Game)

Top-tier automation fleet
Massive passive income generation
Each level dramatically increases output
Strategy: This is your path to becoming a millionaire!

Upgrading Auto Ovens:

Each oven has multiple levels (Level 1, 2, 3, etc.)
Higher levels = more cookies per second
Costs increase with each level
Balance purchases between new ovens and upgrading existing ones


üè™ SHOP SYSTEM
Build your cookie empire with 4 different shops!
How Shops Work:

Each shop has a rotating progress bar on top
The bar fills up over time (duration varies by shop level)
When the bar completes, money is added to your account
The bar immediately resets and starts filling again
Shops earn money even when the game is closed! üì¥

The 4 Shops:
üè™ Shop 1 - Starter Bakery

Your first shop
Moderate earning rate
Low cost to unlock and upgrade
Best for: Early game foundation

üè™ Shop 2 - Cookie House

Mid-level establishment
Better earnings than Shop 1
Requires significant investment
Best for: Accelerating mid-game progress

üè™ Shop 3 - Advanced Dessert Shop

High-tier production facility
Excellent passive income
Expensive but worth it
Best for: Late-game scaling

üè™ Shop 4 - Ultra-Modern Cookie Complex

Ultimate money-making machine
Massive passive earnings
Very expensive to unlock and upgrade
Best for: Becoming a true tycoon!

Shop Upgrade Strategy:

Each shop can be upgraded multiple times
Higher levels = faster bar filling = more money
Balance unlocking new shops vs. upgrading existing ones
Tip: Sometimes upgrading Shop 1 three times is better than unlocking Shop 2 once!


üìà INVESTMENT SYSTEM - HIGH RISK, HIGH REWARD! üî•
Ready to gamble? The investment system lets you multiply your money... or lose it!
How It Works:
1. Real Candlestick Charts

You'll see a live chart with green and red candles
Green candles = price going UP üìà
Red candles = price going DOWN üìâ
Each investment round lasts 15 seconds

2. Place Your Bet

Decide how much money to invest
Choose BUY (if you think price will rise) or SELL (if you think price will fall)
Wait 15 seconds for the result

3. Win or Lose

‚úÖ Correct prediction: Your investment DOUBLES! üí∞üí∞
‚ùå Wrong prediction: You LOSE your investment! üí∏

Investment Strategies:
Conservative Approach:

Only invest 10-20% of your total money
Study the chart patterns before betting
Wait for clear trends (3+ green or red candles)

Aggressive Approach:

Invest large amounts for massive gains
Higher risk = higher reward
Best when you have substantial backup funds

Pattern Recognition:

Look for consecutive green/red candles
Consider recent trends
Remember: markets can reverse suddenly!

üí° Warning: Never invest money you need for essential upgrades! Only gamble with surplus funds.

üìä PROGRESSION SYSTEM
Early Game (0-1,000 Cookies)
Focus: Manual clicking + first upgrades

Click the cookie button constantly
Buy your first click upgrades
Purchase Simple Auto Oven as soon as possible
Convert cookies to money strategically
Goal: Unlock Shop 1

Mid Game (1,000-100,000 Cookies)
Focus: Automation + multiple shops

Upgrade your auto ovens
Purchase Auto Oven Program
Unlock and upgrade Shop 2
Start experimenting with small investments
Goal: Build passive income foundation

Late Game (100,000+ Cookies)
Focus: Empire expansion + investments

Max out Advanced Auto Oven Program
Unlock Shop 3 and Shop 4
Make strategic investments
Optimize shop upgrades
Goal: Achieve millionaire status!

End Game (Millionaire!)
Focus: Maximization

Max level all shops
Max level all auto ovens
Master the investment system
Watch your cityline expand across the screen!
Goal: True cookie tycoon!


üèÜ ACHIEVEMENTS SYSTEM
Track your progress through various milestones:

Total cookies produced
Total money earned
Shops unlocked
Maximum investment win
Days played
And many more!

hits.title: On Fire Basketball Shots
hits.description:
The gym is packed, and the crowd is roaring! The scoreboard's ticking down, and your team is trailing. The only way to win is to sink blazing basketball shots from the court. You're the star player, but the pressure's on‚Äîevery shot counts, and the hoop's rim is red-hot, making each attempt trickier!
"Core: A highly engaging, physics-based arcade sports simulator centered on precision shooting and high-score chasing.
Loop: Players engage in skill-based shooting mechanics to accumulate points, which convert into hard currency (coins) used for continuous progression and reward loops.
Start: Features instant, intuitive accessibility, ensuring immediate player engagement and a strong hook from the first session.
Playgama Fact: The game is fully integrated with Playgama SDK: instant login and cross-device saves between PC and mobile. HTML5. Stable performance regardless of internet quality.
Visual: Utilizes a clean, contemporary Flat Design aesthetic that ensures visual clarity and broad appeal.
Key Feature: Offers deep player customization through various unlockable ball and environment skins, underpinned by robust, authentic shot physics."
hits.howToPlayText:
Ignite the Hoops and Go On Fire! The crowd is roaring as you chain blazing basketball shots from hoop to sizzling hoop in this addictive arcade thriller. Pull back to launch perfect dunks, build unstoppable streaks, set the ball ablaze for massive multipliers, collect coins and stars, and climb the leaderboards with sky-high scores‚Äîevery swish counts in this red-hot test of precision and timing!
Main Objective and Winning Method:
The primary goal is to score as many points as possible by chaining consecutive successful basketball shots into moving hoops without missing. Each dunk adds to your score (with perfect swishes earning bonuses), builds your streak, and unlocks 'On Fire' mode for double points and fiery visual effects. The game ends when you miss a shot‚Äîsurvive longer, chain more dunks, and rack up the highest score to top the global leaderboards and earn coins for upgrades!
Desktop Controls (via emulator or browser):
Mouse: Click and hold on the basketball, drag downward to aim and set power (watch the trajectory guide), release to shoot.
Mobile Controls:
Touch Screen: Tap and hold on the basketball hanging in the net, drag your finger downward to adjust aim and strength, then release to launch the shot toward the next hoop.

* As you go deeper, the challenges get harder but more fun!

hits.howToPlayText:
I. English:
1, Basic controls & gameplay
To play, you use either your mouse (on desktop) or finger/touch input (on touchscreen) to draw symbols on the screen. 
Each ghost shows one or more symbols above its head; you must draw that symbol (or sequence of symbols) correctly to cast a spell and defeat that ghost. 
Symbols vary ‚Äî simple lines, shapes like ‚ÄúV‚Äù or ‚Äú å,‚Äù maybe a lightning bolt, etc
2. What you need to do & how it plays out.
Ghosts approach; as soon as you see a symbol above them, draw the shape quickly to ‚Äúzap‚Äù them with a spell before they hit Momo. 
As levels progress, ghosts come faster and in greater numbers ‚Äî the challenge is both speed and accuracy. 
At the end of each stage (or at least the final one), there‚Äôs a boss ghost ‚Äî often requiring drawing a long chain or repeated spells to beat it. 
3. Goal & Scoring
Your goal: survive through all five levels, defeat all ghosts (and bosses), and save the ocean.

Available for free on mobile or desktop, this engaging adventure encourages logical thinking as you face delightful challenges to sharpen your mind.
hits.howToPlayText:

–û–± –∏–≥—Ä–µ

This fun game is the best combination of brain puzzles. You can enjoy these mind games, decision making tasks with fun puzzles.
Try this incredible mind-blowing brain game, solve challenging puzzles, find a solution and complete each level in these mind-testing games.

hits.title: Racing: Destruction and Chase
hits.description:
Dive into a world where every crash is a masterpiece!  

- Realistic Destruction: Flying doors, hoods, wheels, and sparks under your feet.  
- Freedom of Action: Race, evade the police, or explore the open world at your own pace.  
- Unlimited Tuning: Customize paint jobs, wheel sizes, suspension height, and create your unique style.  
- Destruction Tools: Use presses, hammers, ramps to test vehicle durability.  

Key Features:  
- Dynamic police chases with realistic physics.  
- AI-driven bots that populate the game world.  
- Instant car repair for non-stop action.  

Each collision tells a new story. Every ride is your choice!
hits.howToPlayText:
Controls:  
WASD - movement  
Space - handbrake  
Shift - acceleration (nitro)  
C - camera angle  
R - flip the car  
K - repair  
B - slow motion  
Tab - pause  

On the phone, using the buttons on the screen.

This is the best Color Puzzle Game where you sort sheep, match colors, and have lots of fun! Sheep Sort Color Match Puzzle Game is easy, relaxing, and full of cute sheep. Enjoy sorting sheep in this amazing Color Puzzle Game!

- Tap the sheep and match them by color.
- Sort and match sheep correctly to win each puzzle.
- Complete each puzzle level to move to the next exciting puzzle.
- Puzzles get harder, but sorting and matching sheep becomes more fun!

hits.title: Wood Color Block
hits.description:
Wood Color Block is a new free puzzle game that combines fun, relaxing and brain-teasing challenges! 
Step into a world of colorful wooden blocks, where your goal is to crush all color blocks by move them to their perfect color crushers ‚Äì the more you smash, the more fun it gets! 
Every level brings a new set of challenges, with increasing difficulty and clever block arrangements that will keep you on your toes.
hits.howToPlayText:
Slide the color blocks: Find the way to get the color blocks into the same color crushers to break them. Whether you're sliding, moving, or aligning the blocks, each action you take requires careful thought and planning.
Clear your path before time runs out: With exciting puzzles and unique block mechanics, you'll need to think strategically to break all the blocks and escape before time runs out.
Boosters: As you progress, you'll unlock new tools and power-ups to help you overcome even the toughest puzzles

Wield your axe to fend off wolves, chop wood, and build shelter as you explore for resources and hidden chests. Level up, choose upgrades, and outlast growing dangers while managing hunger and health in this engaging forest challenge.

hits.howToPlayText:

Controls:

Desktop: Use the Arrow Keys to direct your character.


How to conquering Territory:

Move out from your colored territory to draw a trail.
Return to any part of your own territory to complete a loop. The area you've enclosed will be claimed and converted to your color.

Elimination:

You are eliminated if you run into the outer walls or an opponent's established territory.

City Building & Scoring:

As your territory grows, buildings like houses and skyscrapers will automatically be built, generating points for you over time.
Conquering enemy territory, destroying their buildings, and eliminating opponents will also boost your score.

Power-ups:

Occasionally, power-ups will appear on the map. Move over them to collect special abilities for a limited time.
Speed: Move twice as fast.
Shield: Survive one fatal collision.
Ghost: Pass through enemy trails without being eliminated.
Bomb: Instantly claim a large circular area around you.

hits.title: Funny Cubes 2048
hits.description: Discover Funny Cubes 2048, an entertaining twist on the original 2048 game featuring playful physics. Strategically combine cubes to maximize their value, use boosters, and rack up achievements while competing globally. Enjoy free online play across devices and immerse yourself in the fun of merging cubes.
hits.howToPlayText:
The goal of the game is to collect as large a cube as possible.
Throw a cube on the rest to collect the big ones in the genre of 2048.
I.e. if you throw a cube with a face value of 2 on a cube with a face value of 2, then 2 of them will get a cube of 4. I.e. the face value doubles. Nothing happens with cubes with different denominations, so they begin to accumulate and overflow the container, which complicates the game and can lead to a loss. There are also boosters that allow you to sort out a bunch of unassembled cubes, but you need to earn them by trying to collect several cubes at a time.

hits.title: Sorting Ball Puzzle
hits.description:
As the most relaxing and addictive color sorting game, this ball puzzle is designed to entertain and sharpen your mind at the same time. While sorting the colored balls to fill each bottle with the same color, the relaxation it brings will relieve stress and distract you from your daily worries.

This classic color sorting game is pretty simple to play, but hard to master. Just tap to take a colored ball from one bottle and stack it into another bottle, until all balls of the same color are in the same bottle. However, there are thousands of puzzles of varying difficulty. The more challenging the puzzles you play, the more careful you need to be with each move. Each move cannot be taken lightly, or you may get stuck! This Ball Sort game is definitely the best puzzle game for you to exercise your brain and train your logical thinking.
hits.howToPlayText:
Tap any bottle to pick up the top ball, then tap another bottle to move the ball into it.
You can only stack the ball into a bottle with the same color ball on top and enough space.
When balls of the same color are sorted into a single bottle, you win!
Each bottle can only be placed with 4 balls.
Use "Undo" to go back to previous steps.
Add an extra bottle if you get stuck.
You can restart the current level at any time.

hits.title: The Upside Down
hits.description:
A tactical RPG where strategy meets the 80s: Outsmart the Gloom-Walkers and bring your dog home.

üìπ Background

December 1984: As the winter solstice nears, the veil over Black Hollow tears open, allowing shadow entities known as Gloom-Walkers to prey upon the unwary. While the town evacuates to escape the encroaching dark, young Eddie Sinclair stays behind, venturing alone into the snowy ghost town to rescue his best friend, Buddy.
hits.howToPlayText:
üïπÔ∏è How to play

Explore the streets for upgrades and face the darkness, but return home to save and level up. Danger grows with every step away from safety‚Äîplan carefully and watch your Gloometer! Master four unique ways to fight: deploy your boombox to distract the shadows, leaving them rooted in place while you make your escape, blind them with your camera‚Äôs high-intensity flash, or launch powerful fireworks to blast the Gloom-Walkers into oblivion. How far will you go to save Buddy?

   - Objective: Reach the bottom-right corner of the map for the final showdown and rescue your dog.
   - Your Home: Located in the top-left corner. Return here to upgrade your stats and heal yourself by drinking found potions.
   - Survival Tip: Don't venture too far from home until you've grown powerful enough; the outskirts are unforgiving.
   - Scavenge: Explore city buildings to find superior slingshots and powerful "spells" (items).
   - Tactical Combat: Every action on the battlefield takes time. Once an action starts, it cannot be canceled until it‚Äôs finished‚Äîplan your moves wisely!

hits.title: Syntagma
hits.description:
A puzzle adventure with platformer elements.

A suddenly arrived package contains a mysterious artifact, similar to a compass, and an ancient map pointing the way to five mysterious locations with abandoned temples.

To activate the compass and reveal the secrets of the temples, the hero must find unique crystals, symbolizing the five elements, scattered around the world.

To obtain a crystal, you can solve the puzzle only by jumping on active platforms. The correct sequence of stepping on the platforms and collecting all the keys on them opens the vault and grants access to the crystal. There are restrictions on moving across the platforms.

Moving backward and diagonally is prohibited.

Movement is only allowed forward, left, and right.

The start of movement activates defense mechanisms and obstacles that cause damage.

There are 2 difficulty levels, which can be changed in the main menu settings. After completing Level 0, the game will automatically suggest trying Level 1.
hits.howToPlayText:
Controls: Click on a platform with the mouse, tap for mobile, or move the hero with the arrow keys on the keyboard, or press the on-screen arrow buttons for mobile.

Avoid collisions with traps. 1) You can jump over them when moving towards them, or 2) by clicking on the hero, 3) with the spacebar on the keyboard, 4) with a touch button on mobile - this makes the hero jump on the spot at the right moment and allows you to avoid a collision with an obstacle.

hits.title: Hit & Knock Down
hits.description:
Hit & Knock Down is a casual arcade-style shooting/throwing game where you aim to hit targets using various balls. When you successfully hit a target, it will either be knocked down or explode.
The goal is to clear each stage by obtaining the required score (or meeting stage objectives) and then move on to the next challenge.
hits.howToPlayText:
Drag or swipe on the screen to aim the ball toward a target. (Typical of these types of games ‚Äî though the store page doesn‚Äôt detail exact controls, it says ‚Äúsimple control.‚Äù)
Release your touch (or tap, depending on control scheme) to throw the ball toward the designated target.
If your throw strikes the target (a can, dish, fruit, or object), it will either fall or explode. You earn points for successful hits.

hits.title: Pool 8
hits.description:
Pool 8 is a brain-teasing puzzle game based on a Pool board. 
Pot the balls in the correct order to move through a series of increasingly difficult challenges!

There's a multitude of difficulty levels that you naturally progress through, starting with the easiest "rookie" level. At the end of each difficulty level, you get a chance to win extra retries in the "smash the candies" bonus round. You can also earn these by watching a short video ad.
Yes, but it starts out easy. As you progress, you reach higher difficulty levels.
hits.howToPlayText:
The unique mechanics in this game mean you can only move up, down, left, and right. 
There are no diagonal movements, which poses a tricky challenge when several balls are on the table. 
The key to winning the level is to think about the order of each move to ensure you can line up all the shots successfully.

hits.title: Sky Golf
hits.description: Sky Golf is a physics-based puzzle game where your objective is to guide a golf ball from a starting point to the hole. The golf ball rests on a complex structure made entirely of flat, interconnected platforms. Your primary mechanism for moving the ball is to rotate the entire platform structure either clockwise or anti-clockwise by set increments. When you rotate the platforms, gravity acts on the ball, causing it to roll across the flat surfaces. You must strategically time and execute these rotations to change the angle of the platforms, build momentum, and perfectly direct the ball across gaps and around obstacles until it safely drops into the goal. Each level challenges your spatial reasoning to find the precise sequence of rotations required for success.
hits.howToPlayText:
On Desktop/PC:
 -Rotate Left (Anti-Clockwise): Hold the Left Arrow key 
-Right (Clockwise): Hold the Right Arrow key

 On Mobile:
 -Simply tap and hold the on-screen buttons on the left or right side of the display to rotate the platforms in that direction.

hits.title: Devil Die
hits.description:
Devil Die looks like a simple, cute 2D platformer until the floor suddenly disappears, spikes pop out of nowhere, and the ‚Äúsafe‚Äù door turns into a trap.

You play as a tiny pixel hero trying to reach the exit door in each stage. The controls are super easy, but the levels are full of hidden tricks: falling platforms, surprise buzzsaws, moving walls, reversed controls, fake safe zones, and more. The game starts simple and then slowly turns into a rage-game where every step can be a trap.
hits.howToPlayText:
Mobile Controls :

Left arrow ‚Äì Move left
Right arrow ‚Äì Move right
Jump button ‚Äì Jump over gaps and traps

PC / Laptop Controls:

A key ‚Üí Move left
D key ‚Üí Move right
Space bar ‚Üí Jump

Reach the exit door in every level.
Avoid all spikes, pits, saws and hidden traps.
If you touch a trap, you die and restart the level.

hits.title: CubeGate
hits.description:
Puzzle-platformer inspired by portal-style test chambers. Move through clean sci-fi rooms, pick up glowing cubes and place them on pressure plates to power doors, bridges, and elevators. Every room is a mini-logic task: sometimes one cube isn‚Äôt enough, sometimes the order matters, and sometimes you‚Äôll have to jump first, then power the gate.

Use your movement and your head: combine precise jumps with smart cube placement, watch where the cables go, and follow the energy lines to the exit. Short levels, clear goals, instant restarts ‚Äî perfect for quick sessions.
Can you activate every gate and escape the chamber?
hits.howToPlayText:
Goal: place cubes on the marked plates, power the logic gates, and open the doors to the next area. Action order, power distance, and precise jumping matter.

W, A, S, D, Q, Z Arrow Keys ‚Äî move

E, Left Mouse Button ‚Äî pick up / put down cube

Space, Right Mouse Button ‚Äî jump

Shift ‚Äî sprint

Escape ‚Äî menu (restart level, sound on/off)

Tips:
Floor markings and highlights will show where to place the cubes.
If you get stuck, open the menu and choose restart, then try a different sequence.
When carrying a cube, plan your route in advance.
For distant platforms, sprint first and jump from the edge.

hits.title: Durak
hits.description:
Durak is essentially a shedding card game where each player will try to get rid of the cards in their hand first. Durak is quite an enjoyable game that has over the years made a general impact on millions. It is a game that requires critical thinking, which is why it is more popular among people who consider themselves tech-savvy.

The objective of Durak is to play all your cards. The loser in Durak will be the last player with cards in their hand. So, to ensure you do not lose, try to act fast and get rid of your cards as soon as you can.

Durak is the most popular Russian card game. Durak means fool and it refers to the person who loses the game.

A Durak card game is one of the easiest and most fun card games. Players do not need much to get started. You will only need: a poker deck reduced to 36 cards from Ace to 6.

However, this game is quite interesting because there will usually be multiple winners. To ensure you do not lose, try to act fast and get rid of your cards as soon as you can.


Durak might not be a game you are overly familiar with. But in Russia, Durak is by far the most popular card game! It has got a fascinating history and will be sure to make a unique choice if you are looking for something a little different.

Another interesting thing about this game is that it is played with a smaller deck.

Durak is fun and, rather, a unique card game. If you enjoy more strategic card games and are looking for something a little different, why not give Durak a try?
hits.howToPlayText:
Durak is played by 2 to 4 players. Total cards used are 36 cards - Only 6 7 8 9 10 J Q K A of all suits are used.

The deck is shuffled, and each player is dealt with 6 cards. The bottom card of the stock is turned and placed face up on the table. The rest of the pack is then placed on half over the turn-up and at right angles to it, so that it remains visible. The trump suit is drawn as the last card.

The first person to play is the one who holds the lowest trump suit in his hand. The game proceeds in a clockwise direction. The player who started to play acts as an attacker and the player sitting next to him in a clockwise direction acts as a defender.

The player who has the lowest trump card will be the first attacker. If the attack succeeds, the defender loses their turn, and the attack passes to the player on the defender's left. If the attack fails, the defender becomes the next attacker. The attacker opens their turn by playing a card face up on the table as an attacking card. Defender responds to the attack with a defending card. A trump card of any rank beats all cards in the other three suits

To win Durak, you need to play all your cards quickly. Once you have played your cards, you are out of the game and will need to wait for the rest of the players. The last player with cards in their hand loses.

hits.title: TENKYU BALL
hits.description: TENKYU BALL is a 3D casual ball-rolling puzzle game where you must guide a ball through tilting stages to reach the goal. The environment is minimalistic, and the challenge comes from balancing control vs risk. As you tilt the stage more, the ball moves faster, but there‚Äôs danger: if you tilt too much, the ball may fall off and you'll fail the level.
hits.howToPlayText:
Tilt the stage / swipe finger:
You swipe (or drag) on your screen to tilt the surface on which the ball rests.
The tilt direction determines where the ball rolls.
Control carefully:
If you tilt too much, the ball gains speed and can fall off the edge.
Tilt only as much as needed to navigate turns, avoid gaps, and make tricky maneuvers.
Reach the goal:
Each stage has a goal point or exit you must reach. Successfully get the ball there without falling off.
Failure and retry:
If the ball falls, the level ends (you lose) and you‚Äôll need to restart that stage.

hits.title: Fruitsland: Escape from the Amusement Park
hits.description:
Welcome to Fruitsland ‚Äì a unique amusement park where fun awaits at every turn! Colorful carousels, exciting rides, and entertainers dressed as fruits ‚Äì apples, bananas, watermelons, and oranges ‚Äì fill the park. Children‚Äôs laughter fills the air, as school groups with teachers and families with kids flock to enjoy the day. Everything seems perfect, but not all is as it seems... One careless step, and you fall through an old hatch, landing in a spooky, long-abandoned part of the park hidden underground.

Before you lies a chilling, forgotten underground park where strange scientific experiments were once conducted. Only remnants of these experiments remain now, with crumbling rides and deserted game rooms that carry no joy. An eerie silence surrounds you, broken only by the sounds of old machinery and the shuffling of mysterious creatures. The first location is themed around apples ‚Äì at first, it seems harmless, but soon you realize you‚Äôre trapped. As you study the remnants of the scientists‚Äô journals, you uncover their plans to bring fruit to life, fruit that would entertain visitors around the clock. The sinister plan of the park‚Äôs owner aimed to turn fruits into real entertainers, capable of anything to amuse guests.

Your mission now is to escape from this underground horror. Every step brings new puzzles, challenging tasks, and deadly monsters that lurk around every corner, the results of failed experiments. Surviving here won‚Äôt be easy: these animated fruits have come to life, and now they‚Äôre hunting you. Every corner is a new survival test filled with horror, fear, and adrenaline. Choose your path wisely, solve puzzles to find your way out, and avoid deadly traps and monsters that only look like harmless fruits.

The first monster you will encounter is a blind apple, a nightmare resembling a zombie. It aimlessly roams the empty sections of the park, filling everyone who sees it with dread.

The second section is dedicated to the banana. This is the second colorful monster brought to life by horrifying experiments. Seeing it makes you feel as if something is invading your mind.

The third section of the underground park is dedicated to the Pomegranate ‚Äî a sinister fruit with two large eyes. These roaming eyes not only track unwelcome guests but also attack them. They emerge from their sockets and move independently, chasing their target across the area.

Can you escape from this park and see the sunlight again? Will you find a way to break free from the gloomy underground? This horror game is for those ready for survival, monster hunts, immersion in fear, and adrenaline! Complete quests, solve puzzles, defeat monsters, and find freedom while uncovering the mysteries of Fruitsland.

Download this game to dive into the fruit garden‚Ä¶ if you dare!
hits.howToPlayText:
WASD - Move
C - Crouch
Space - Jump

The main goal is to escape the park by solving puzzles. Find useful items and use them to your advantage.

hits.title: Laser Survivor
hits.description:
Laser Survivor, a cyberpunk roguelike action-adventure set in a neon-drenched post-apocalypse, the last hope for humanity rests in the hands of five heroes fighting hordes of demons pouring through a dimensional rift. Featuring pixel art visuals, randomized weapons, chiptune soundtracks, and relentless survival gameplay, every run is a test of adaptation and skill.

Story
The world has fallen. A dimensional rift has unleashed an unstoppable flood of demons, tearing through what remains of civilization. But from the chaos, five warriors rise. Each wielding unique powers forged for survival in this cyberpunk hellscape. Dropped at random into corrupted maps, they must adapt with whatever weapons and passive abilities they find, carving their path through waves of enemies, unlocking upgrades, and uncovering the truth behind the rift. The fate of Earth depends on them.

Heroes
Blaze: Fires homing bullets that lock onto the nearest enemy, ensuring no demon can escape.
Neon: Projects a protective energy shield that damages anything foolish enough to get close.
Hunter: Drops explosives that create deadly zones, controlling the battlefield with traps.
Slash: Slices enemies apart with razor-sharp horizontal cuts that pierce entire hordes.
Jaxx: A cyber-brute with massive, scaling area damage, crushing everything in his path.


Features
Cyberpunk Roguelike Gameplay: Every run is unique, with randomized spawn points, weapons, and abilities.
5 Maps to Conquer: Battle through the Lab, Forest, Crypt, Factory, and Dungeon, each swarming with demon hordes.
10 Active Weapons & 10 Passive Abilities: Build your arsenal on the fly as you adapt to randomized loadouts.
8 Missions & 11 Upgrades: Progress through challenging missions, earn permanent upgrades, and unlock new survival tactics.
Collectibles & Lore: Discover secrets that reveal the origins of the rift and the story behind the invasion.
Retro Pixel Art: Neon-infused visuals with hand-crafted pixel art and gameplay by the Felicity team.
80s Chiptune Soundtrack: Pulsating tracker music by Drozerix, driving the action with nostalgic energy.

Why Play Laser Survivor?
Fast-paced roguelike survival set in a sci-fi cyberpunk apocalypse.
Play as five unique heroes, each with distinct base abilities and upgrade paths.
Endless replayability with randomized runs and evolving builds.
Perfect for fans of pixel art shooters, bullet-hell roguelikes, and retro-inspired chiptune soundtracks.

Laser Survivor is more than survival. It‚Äôs humanity‚Äôs last stand in a cyberpunk post-apocalypse. Will you master the chaos, close the rift, and save the world... or be consumed by the demons?
hits.howToPlayText: Arrow keys, or WASD for movement of the characters with keyboard, or Mouse. Touch controls on Mobile for movement of the characters.

hits.howToPlayText:
Metal Production üî©:

Metals ‚Üí Money üíµ:

hits.title: Bubble Tower
hits.description:
Bubble Tower 3D is a relaxing 3D bubble-pop / color-match puzzle game.
You rotate a tower (or cylinder) loaded with colored bubbles around its vertical axis.
Your goal is to shoot bubbles, matching colors to connect groups of the same color. When matched, those bubbles pop/drop off the tower.
There are many levels; difficulty increases as you go. More bubble colors, trickier arrangements, limited shots, etc.
Also there are diamonds or special gems you can collect in certain levels. These may unlock ‚Äúshiny shapes‚Äù or cosmetic things.
The graphics are clean, simple, and meant for relaxing casual play. It mixes mental challenge (where to shoot, color matching) with a soothing visual.
hits.howToPlayText:
A tower appears with a cluster of bubbles of various colors. There‚Äôs a shooter that holds the next bubble to fire.
You can rotate the tower around (usually by dragging left/right or using onscreen controls) to bring bubbles of matching color in position.
Tap or drag to aim, then let go (or tap a location) to shoot the bubble toward the tower. Match it with other bubbles of the same color.
When you connect 3 or more bubbles of the same color, those bubbles pop/drop off. Bubbles that are hanging (i.e. no longer connected to the base or other bubbles) also fall off.
Some levels include diamonds or special gems placed in certain parts of the bubble structure. You need to target those, maybe by matching bubbles around them or popping surrounding bubbles to let them fall.
You win a level if all bubbles (or the required ones) are cleared. If you run out of shots (or fail to clear the required bubbles), you lose and must retry.

hits.title: Craftsman Land
hits.description:
Craftsman Land ‚Äì build your own farm and help the town recover!

Craftsman Land is a farming and crafting game where your goal is to rebuild the inherited land, expand your farm, and support the local community.

After a devastating flood, the town is in ruins. As the heir to the land, it‚Äôs up to you to restore your farm, help the townsfolk, and bring life back to the surrounding villages. Grow crops like corn and onions, go fishing, and construct new buildings such as a house, chicken coop, and cowshed. Inside your home, you can decorate and design the interior to your liking.

Take care of your animals ‚Äì feed chickens and cows, collect fresh eggs and milk, and use them for crafting or trading. Complete quests for local people, trade with merchants, and produce a wide variety of items thanks to the crafting system. Improve your skills, specialize in your favorite activities, and become a true master craftsman.

The world of Craftsman Land is constantly growing with new places, tasks, and adventures waiting to be discovered
hits.howToPlayText:
In Craftsman Land, playing is simple and intuitive. On mobile devices you tap the screen, while on PC you use the mouse. Actions are performed automatically ‚Äì all you need are the required items and resources. With just a click, you can trigger different activities such as building houses, crafting tools, or producing goods.

Complete quests given by townsfolk to earn rewards and progress in the story. When you run out of quests, head to the crossroads where the bulletin board offers an endless supply of new tasks.

Explore the map to visit different shops:

Building materials store ‚Äì get everything you need for construction.

Tool shop ‚Äì find useful equipment for your farm.

Gardening store ‚Äì buy seeds and expand your fields.

Not everything has to be bought! Many materials can be produced by yourself. Chop wood, fire clay into bricks at the campfire, and create other essential resources to use in crafting and construction.

Grow crops, raise animals, trade, and craft your way to success while helping the entire town thrive!

hits.description: A top-down, physics-based, medieval melee fighter! Block projectiles and melee attack with your weapons and try to hit the enemies! Survive for as long as you can by dodging attacks, quickly killing enemies and buying items form the shop between rounds!
hits.howToPlayText:
Use the Mouse to swing your weapon and W A S D to move your character.
 Right click or press Shift to dodge roll.
 Buy items to upgrade your knight and survive the waves of chaos.
 Look for special items to assist in smiting your foes.
 Take on the ultimate challenge and defeat all the bosses.

hits.title: Pool Float Party
hits.description: The best friends Blondie and Marie decided to have a pool party. What kind of party is there without cocktails? Let's make a refreshing mojito from soda, lemon, lime and mint leaves together. While Blondie is making cocktails, Marie is cleaning up the area next to the pool. Help the girls with creating a unique design for the party. Now that everything is ready, you can take care of yourself. Make up for each of the girls and choose the right outfit. Choose from a variety of swimsuits and pareos. Blondie prefers pink shades, while Marie loves the combination of red and black colors and the polka dot pattern. Don't forget to add stylish accessories to your look and choose an original-shaped inflatable raft for girls.
hits.howToPlayText: On hot summer days, two best friends want to have fun drinking refreshing cocktails in a small but private pool. But to do this, you need to clean and repair the pool, choose outfits and accessories for relaxing on the water and, of course, make cocktails. Help your friends in carrying out their plans! The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.

hits.title: Save the Noob
hits.description: Save the Noob is an engaging puzzle game that invites players to creatively rescue Noob from threats using a magical line. Accessible online for free across devices, it boasts numerous challenging levels that offer fun and strategic gameplay, perfect for passing the time.
hits.howToPlayText:
Draw a line in the selected area of the screen, without intersections and without going beyond the boundaries of the area.
After you finish drawing the line, it will fall.
When falling, you need to destroy all the enemies and not touch the Noob.

hits.title: MergeMaster: Dragonets
hits.description:
"MergeMaster: Dragonets" is a puzzle game in the 2048 and Merge genre.
The goal of the game is to connect as many identical dragonets in bubbles as possible without overfilling the field.
By connecting the dragonets, you earn points. The number of points you earn depends on your level, which increases over time.
You can use the bonuses located below the game board to speed up the process of filling and clearing the board.

Have a nice game!
hits.howToPlayText:
- specify the point where the bubble will fall
- click on the bonuses located at the bottom
- enjoy the game and earn points

hits.title: Find Visitors - 99 Nights
hits.description:
Find Visitors - 99 Nights -  is an atmospheric game where you take on the role of the manager of a forest refuge. Let the forest creatures in and drive away the visitors.

Check for signs and identify hidden monsters ‚Äì the visitors!
hits.howToPlayText:
All game actions can be customized using the mouse or a finger.

The game has a "Rules" button‚Äîit's recommended to constantly review it for a better gaming experience.

Brief rules: welcome forest dwellers into your hand and drive away visitors. Signs of a visitor include perfectly white teeth, blood on the teeth, a red white eye, a rapidly moving pupil, a red spot on the aura photo, and lack of movement.

hits.title: PolyBounce Tycoon
hits.description:
PolyBounce Tycoon is an idle + arcade style ball bounce game with physics! Spawn balls, bounce them around, earn virtual cash, and unlock new arenas.

Features:

Arena Shapes: Play inside circles, squares, triangles, hexagons, and more. Each level changes the arena.

Balls: Spawn manually or let the auto spawner (auto clicker style) do the work.

Virtual Earnings: Every bounce gives you in-game cash with popup text and sound effects. The amount grows dynamically ($1.5k, $2.5m, etc.).

Upgrades:

Spawn new balls.

Increase virtual cash earned per bounce.

Speed up the auto spawner.

Upgrade balls with new sprites and levels.

Next Level: Unlock new arena shapes, reset upgrades, and multiply your in-game profits.

Idle mechanics, bounce physics, and tycoon upgrades combined. Build your ball idle empire in PolyBounce Tycoon!

(Note: All cash in this game is virtual currency and has no real-world value.)
hits.howToPlayText:
* Tap anywhere on the screen to temporarily boost the ball speed for free.

* At the bottom, you‚Äôll see 3 upgrade buttons:

  1. **Add Ball** ‚Äì Spawns an extra ball to increase your total earnings.
  2. **Incremental Payout** ‚Äì Increases the money you earn each time a ball bounces off the wall.
  3. **Passive Income** ‚Äì Raises the passive income you earn every second, even when idle.

* In the **Shop**, you can unlock new ball skins by watching ads.

You play as a trash sort every bottle, can, paper scrap, or food waste you sort correctly helps nature recover. 
As you recycle more, the scenes slowly change from polluted and gray to clean, colorful, and full of happy animals again. 
It feels simple to play, but very satisfying to watch the environment heal because of your actions.
hits.howToPlayText:
tap and drag items into the matching bin.
Each bin has a symbol or color that matches a type of waste (for example, a bottle for glass, leaf for organic).

hits.title: Jigsaw Puzzle - Anime
hits.description:
Welcome to the world of Jigsaw Puzzle - Anime - classic anime-themed puzzles! This game offers the perfect combination of relaxation, entertainment and brain training.

Anime puzzles provides you with several free and premium puzzles with anime motifs. You can even create your own puzzles using images and photos of your family to make the game even more special.

Each piece of our puzzles is unique and carefully crafted to ensure an enjoyable time for everyone who loves puzzles. You will be delighted by the variety and beauty of the anime pictures you can collect.
hits.howToPlayText:
Choose a Puzzle: Start by selecting a puzzle from the collection. Anime puzzles offers a variety of both free and premium anime-themed puzzles. You can also create your own puzzles using your family photos for a personal touch.

Arrange the Pieces: Once you've chosen a puzzle, you'll be presented with scattered puzzle pieces on the screen. Your goal is to arrange these pieces to form the complete image.

Drag and Drop: To move a puzzle piece, simply tap/click and hold it, then drag it to the desired location on the puzzle board. Release your finger/mouse button to drop the piece in place.

hits.title: Onet Puzzle - Tile Match Game
hits.description: Onet Puzzle is a tile-matching game to play and relax in the free time. It offers 20+ elaborate themes and music for much fun! With memory of your brain and concentration of your mind, you search pairs, connect to eliminate them during the given time. Higher level you get more challenging it is, but various tools and treasure box are there for help! Enjoy it now!
hits.howToPlayText:
HOW TO PLAY
- Connect two same tiles to eliminate them with a polyline.
- The polyline contains no more than 3 inflection points.
- Get harder for higher level with more grids and types of pairs.
- 4 useful tools are there to help.
- More scores and higher level you get when you win.
- Higher enough to get treasure box.
- There is time limit.

hits.title: Slice & Soar
hits.description:
Welcome to Flying Cut, the ultimate cutting game from Voodoo! Are you ready to soar through the skies and slice everything in your path?

With the Flying Cut, you can slice through objects in the air and collect as many points as possible. But it's not just about slicing - you'll need to use your strategic skills to avoid obstacles and master the art of timing to emerge victorious.

Challenge yourself with new levels and obstacles that will put your cutting skills to the test. Beat the competition to become the ultimate Flying Cut champion.

With its addictive gameplay and easy-to-use interface, Flying Cut is the perfect game for players of all ages. And with the option to play online or offline, you can enjoy it anytime, anywhere.
hits.howToPlayText:
You use touch controls (swipe / drag) to slice through the objects.
You need good timing: slicing at the right moment to hit the right object without hitting obstacles.
Some levels or patterns will require more accuracy: avoid missing or touching forbidden items.
The aim is to get as many points as possible by cutting things, while avoiding obstacles.

hits.title: Space Obby
hits.description: A fun and lighthearted platformer set in outer space. Join other intrepid astronauts as you adventure to the far reaching corners of a destroyed space station, using your trusty jetpack to navigate the floating wreckage. Featuring six unlockable characters and collectable battery cells scattered across four massive levels -- do you have what it takes to reach the end?
hits.howToPlayText:
Objective: Explore the space station wreckage, collect power cells to open doors to new levels and unlock characters.

Mouse and Keyboard Controls:
Movement: WASD or arrow keys
Jump: Spacebar
Jetpack : Hold spacebar midair
Camera Rotation: Move mouse
Camera Zoom: Scroll wheel
Settings Menu: P key

Mobile Touch Controls:
Movement: Touch and drag the on-screen joystick on the left of the screen
Jump: Tap jump button on the right of the screen
Jetpack : Hold jump button on the right of the screen
Camera Rotation: Swipe anywhere on the screen
Camera Zoom: Pinch anywhere on the screen

hits.title: Emoji Guess
hits.description: Show off your skills as an emoji interpreter in this supremely fun and frenetic puzzle game where you have to pick the right set of emojis to express the phrase, saying or movie title that‚Äôs written or illustrated above. Solve endless emoji puzzles by matching the right emojis in the right order and sharpen your logic, word association and visual perception skills with hundreds of short, colorful and often hilarious levels of brain-teasing entertainment. hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to pick the correct sequence of emojis that represent the phrase, saying, or movie title shown above the puzzle. Think of it as translating text or ideas into emoji form in the right order.
Each level presents a prompt (text-based or illustrated) and a jumble of emojis.
You select emojis in the precise order needed to match the intended phrase.
If you're correct on the first try, you earn all the stars for that level. Otherwise, you‚Äôll get additional attempts with guidance.
Stuck on a puzzle? The game offers helpful hints that can nudge you in the right direction without giving the full answer away.

hits.title: Doodle Halloween Momo Cat: Academy
hits.description:
Magic Cat Academy is a fun and adorable adventure game where you play as Momo the magic cat, a brave little student with big powers! One spooky night, silly ghosts sneak into her school and steal the magic book. Now it‚Äôs up to Momo to save the day!

To help Momo, players draw simple shapes on the screen to cast magic spells and pop the ghosts away. Each level takes you to a new part of the school, like the classroom, cafeteria, and even the rooftop. The ghosts get quicker and trickier, but with fast hands and sharp eyes, you can beat them all!

With cute characters, colorful animations, and easy touch controls, Magic Cat Academy is a safe, exciting, and kid-friendly game that‚Äôs perfect for players of all ages.

Help the lovely Momo Magic Cat cast out mischievous spirits by swiping in the shape of the symbols above the ghosts‚Äô heads. And you‚Äôd better pounce fast‚Äîthe ghost that stole the Arcane Magic spellbook is getting away! The school and all arcane magic are depended on your actions.

PURR-ify Ghost and Ghouls with your Arcane Magic. Swipe your magic wand to cast magic and save the Halloween.
hits.howToPlayText:
1. Basic controls & gameplay
To play, you use either your mouse (on desktop) or finger/touch input (on touchscreen) to draw symbols on the screen. 
Each ghost shows one or more symbols above its head; you must draw that symbol (or sequence of symbols) correctly to cast a spell and defeat that ghost. 
Symbols vary ‚Äî simple lines, shapes like ‚ÄúV‚Äù or ‚Äú å,‚Äù maybe a lightning bolt, etc
2. What you need to do & how it plays out.
Ghosts approach; as soon as you see a symbol above them, draw the shape quickly to ‚Äúzap‚Äù them with a spell before they hit Momo. 
As levels progress, ghosts come faster and in greater numbers ‚Äî the challenge is both speed and accuracy. 
At the end of each stage (or at least the final one), there‚Äôs a boss ghost ‚Äî often requiring drawing a long chain or repeated spells to beat it. 
3. Goal & Scoring
Your goal: survive through all five levels, defeat all ghosts (and bosses), and reclaim the spellbook.

hits.title: Roots and Wheels
hits.description:
This exciting simulator presents you with an ambitious task: get behind the wheel of a powerful truck and transport as many crates as possible through dangerous and unpredictable locations to your destination.


Success depends on your skill‚Äîyour ability to feel the vehicle and react to road conditions‚Äîand your wits‚Äîyour ability to find the best solutions in difficult situations, whether it's mud, steep climbs, or destroyed bridges. Every box delivered brings you closer to your reward.


By earning money for completed trips, you get the opportunity to upgrade your truck ‚Äì from the engine to the suspension to the wheels ‚Äì and better equip it for the challenges of the terrain.


You can also buy new vehicle models, expanding your options and gaining access to new types of missions and cargo. Show what a real driver can do!

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
hits.howToPlayText:
Get behind the wheel of the powerful military Ural in this exciting simulation game! The driver of the military Ural challenges you not just to drive, but to deliver valuable cargo skillfully. The controls are intuitive, whether you're playing on your phone or computer. On mobile devices you control the movement with touch pedals: right - forward, left - backward. On the computer you use the keys: D for forward and A for backward.

hits.howToPlayText: The main objective is to complete all mathematical equations on the board by dragging number tiles from the pool to the empty slots. The primary control is using the mouse (or touch on mobile devices) to drag and drop tiles. If you make a mistake, you can remove tiles by dragging them back to the pool.

hits.howToPlayText:

Keep balancing until you reach the end.
Reach the boat to finish the level.

hits.title: Cards in Fool
hits.description: Play Cards in Fool ‚Äì a strategic turn-based online card game! Outsmart opponents, make them draw cards, and climb the leaderboard. Flip cards, win matches, and earn points in this classic multiplayer challenge!
hits.howToPlayText: In the game of "Cards a Fool", the classic rules are that the one with the smaller trump card goes first. There are 36 cards in the deck. At the beginning, one trump card is selected, which determines the highest suit over all. The principle of the game is the same, First one goes with any card, the other must fight off with the highest of the same suit or a trump card. If the one who strayed then he walks and so on in turn. The winner is the one who has no cards left and the deck is empty. In the case when no one has any cards left, a draw is recognized, in this case no points are awarded or taken away. Track your score on the leaderboard.

hits.title: Shape Jam
hits.description:
Get ready to jam with shapes in this playful physics puzzle game!
In Shape Jam, your goal is simple: collect 3 matching shapes to clear the board. 
But every move counts  the pick zone is limited, the shapes tumble with physics, and the order you choose decides your success.
hits.howToPlayText:
Clear the board by collecting 3 matching shapes. When you make a set of 3 same shapes, they get cleared.
Tap a shape to pick it. The picked shape goes into your pick/holding slots at the top (the small empty circles).
Make a triple: If you collect 3 of the same shape in your slots, they clear automatically.
Don‚Äôt fill the slots: Your pick area/slots are limited, so the order you pick shapes matters.

hits.title: Project: Survival
hits.description:
PROJECT: SURVIVAL

Welcome to Project: Survival ‚Äî a fast-paced zombie survival shooter where every shot, every second, and every decision counts.

Drop into Ghost Map City, where chaos echoes through empty streets, or brave the twisted halls of Zombie Hospital, where every corner hides something waiting to strike. Scavenge what‚Äôs left of the world, complete deadly missions, and climb the ranks as you fight through relentless waves of the undead.

From crawlers that lurk beneath wreckage to spitters that melt through your cover, every encounter pushes your instincts and aim to the limit. Survive long enough, and you‚Äôll earn rewards to expand your loadout, unlock brutal new weapons, and forge the arsenal that keeps you alive when the horde closes in.

Your progress is your power ‚Äî and your only lifeline. Collect ammo and medkits from fallen enemies to stay in the fight. Each mission brings a new test of endurance and precision, taking you one step closer to becoming the ultimate survivor.

Die? Maybe.
Give up? Never.
Use rewarded revives to get back up, skip impossible missions, or unlock exclusive weapons to turn the tide. There‚Äôs always another chance ‚Äî if you‚Äôre bold enough to take it.

Two maps. Endless zombies. No excuses.
This is your fight, your survival.

Survive the outbreak. Complete deadly missions. Build the ultimate arsenal.
Welcome to Project: Survival.

hits.title: Dice Puzzle
hits.description: Dice Puzzle is a puzzle game where your task is to strategically place numbered cubes on the board, aiming to merge three adjacent cubes with the same number. As they combine, their value increases. Carefully select cubes with different points, considering their placement to match with others effectively. Be mindful, as cubes may appear individually or in pairs. Merge three or more dice horizontally or vertically to create higher-valued cubes. Utilize the storage space wisely to save cubes for later use. Test your puzzle-solving skills in this engaging dice-merging game!
hits.howToPlayText:
Select a die (or a pair) from your tray and drag it onto the grid where it fits.
Tap the dice in the tray to rotate them before placing, especially helpful for pairs
When three or more dice of the same face touch, whether horizontally or vertically (even diagonally adjacently), they automatically merge into one higher-value die

hits.howToPlayText:
Welcome to the exciting world of Mystical Blades, the ultimate simulation game for B-Blades fans! Get ready to embark on a thrilling adventure where you'll create your very own B-Blades and bring it to life by mixing various elements, blades, and rings.

In Mystical Blades, you have the power to unleash your imagination and design the B-Blades of your dreams. Experiment with different combinations of blades, rings, and elements to create a unique and powerful creature that will dominate the B-Blades arena.

But that's not all! In this game, you'll also have the opportunity to battle other players from around the world and prove your skills as the ultimate B-Blades master. Show off your strategic thinking and battle tactics to rise to the top of the rankings and become the best of the best.

With stunning graphics and realistic physics, Mystical Blades offers a truly immersive gaming experience that will keep you hooked for hours on end. Whether you're a long-time B-Blades fan or new to the series, this game is sure to provide endless hours of entertainment and excitement. So what are you waiting for? Start your journey now and become a Mystical Blades legend!

hits.title: Number Sums
hits.description:
Number Sums is a challenging number puzzle to train your mental math. The goal is to make the sum of numbers in each row, column, and colored region be equal to the clues on the side of the board and inside the colored regions. Practice your math skills and logic with Number Sums!

Each row, column, and region has its own solution, but the goal of this math game with numbers is to make them all work at the same time. You have to circle the correct numbers and erase the numbers you don't need. Remember, the sums of the numbers in rows, columns and colored regions should be equal to the numbers on the sides of the board and inside each region. Each level of this numbers game has only one solution, try to find it to solve educational math puzzles!

Mental arithmetic is an invaluable math skill for your everyday life. Inside Number Sums you'll find math puzzles of various difficulty. The mechanics of these math riddles sounds simple but requires a lot of thinking. Playing sum number games and solving math problems can improve your arithmetic skills. If you are interested in number puzzles or math games for adults, and in training your addition skills, play this engaging number game for hours of fun!
hits.howToPlayText:
- Circle the correct numbers that add up to the values on the sides of the rows, columns and regions.
- Use the toggle to switch between circling and erasing modes. It will help you to mark the correct numbers and the extra numbers that you don't need.
- Each level of these math puzzles has only one possible solution, so make sure that the rows, columns and colored regions work together at the same time.
- Train your math skills with this free number puzzle with various levels of difficulty. Open different types of board from 3x3 to 10x10.

hits.title: Dice Merge
hits.description: Roll, merge, and race against time in this fast-paced dice puzzle game. Each roll resets a 10-second timer, and your score is multiplied by the time you have left. Drag and merge matching dice to build higher numbers, use special X dice to destroy others for extra points, and strategize before the clock runs out. Reach higher combos, manage your limited dice count, and aim for the best score before time hits zero.
hits.howToPlayText:
Press Space or click the Roll button to create 2 dice and reset the timer. Merge dice numbers (like 1+5, 3+3, or 2+2+2) to create a 6. When you merge two sixes, you get the X dice, which can destroy any other dice. The higher the dice value destroyed and the more time left on the timer,  the higher your score! You can click the "?" button to check every merge combination.

The timer starts with 10 seconds, and then gets reduced to 5 seconds after 2 minutes.

hits.title: Okay
hits.description:
Okay? is a minimalist puzzle game that turns simple shapes into clever challenges. Every level is made of blocks, lines, and objects placed on a clean, abstract screen. Your goal is simple: clear all the objects with just one perfect move.

Draw a line with your finger, release it, and watch it bounce around the screen. If your move is right, the line will hit and remove every object until the screen is empty. Sounds easy? As levels go up, the puzzles get smarter, requiring perfect angles, timing, and logic.
hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to clear all the elements (lines, blocks, etc.) from the board.
You draw a line (with your finger / touch) starting from somewhere, and that line interacts with the elements on screen.
The drawn line will ‚Äúpop‚Äù or hit the elements, making them disappear (‚Äúclear all the elements‚Äù) if done correctly.
There are many levels, increasingly challenging.
Some puzzles are simple; others require more precise dragging, angles, and timing.

hits.title: Bus Color Jam
hits.description:
Bus Color Jam ‚Äì Fun Puzzle Adventure with Colorful Challenges!

Get ready for Bus Jam, the ultimate bus game that‚Äôs all about matching passengers to their buses in this relaxing yet brain-teasing bus mania adventure. It's up to you to solve fun, colorful puzzles and clear the way to send each passenger on their dream vacation!

In this exciting puzzle game, you'll encounter progressively challenging levels as you advance. Your goal? Strategically match passengers with their correctly colored buses!
hits.howToPlayText:
Tap a passenger to send them toward the bus. If the passenger‚Äôs color matches the bus, they board immediately. If not, they wait in the empty tile(s) provided.

hits.title: Bow Brawls
hits.description:
Bow Brawls ‚Äì Top-Down Archery Battles!

Enter Bow Brawls, a thrilling archery survival game where you aim with drag controls that feel like a real bow. Pull, release, and strike down endless waves of enemies! Each wave ends with a powerful boss fight, forcing you to master skill and strategy.

Unlock 5 unique bows, 5 armors, and 5 arenas as you progress. Every weapon and battleground adds a new style of play. Face bosses with special abilities and prove your reflexes in intense battles.

Compete with players worldwide through global leaderboards. Show off your best scores and climb to the top to become the ultimate archer.

Perfect for casual players, kids, and competitive gamers, Bow Brawls is easy to pick up yet challenging to master. Endless action, exciting unlocks, and competitive spirit await you.

üéØ Aim true. ‚öî Defeat bosses. üëë Rule the leaderboard.
Play Bow Brawls now and test your archery skills!
hits.howToPlayText:
How to Play

In Bow Brawls, survive endless waves of enemies using skill and precision. Use the joystick (mobile) or WASD (PC) to move. Aim by pulling the on-screen joystick in the opposite direction of your target‚Äîrelease to shoot arrows like a real bow.

Enemies attack from all directions, including melee fighters and ranged shooters. Every few waves, a boss appears with unique skills like dashing, jumping over you, or launching projectiles‚Äîstay alert and adapt!

Defeat bosses to earn gems, which unlock new bows and armors with different abilities. Reach higher scores to unlock new arenas and face tougher challenges.

Your score is based on enemy kills, with each type rewarding different points. Climb the leaderboards by defeating as many enemies as possible. Manage your health bar carefully‚Äîyou only get one life per run.

Master your aim, survive waves, defeat bosses, and rise as the ultimate archer!

hits.howToPlayText:

You drag a block using your finger (touch screen) or with mouse (click & drag)

There is no time limit, and there‚Äôs no losing condition ‚Äî you just progress by completing levels.

hits.description:
Merge the Blocks, Reach 2048, and Conquer the Levels!**

Blocks with numbers from 2 to 2048 drop onto the field. Combine matching blocks to create higher-value ones and score points. But watch out ‚Äî some blocks are stones, which can‚Äôt be merged. Use powerful boosters like bombs and lightning to clear them out.
1. Make the most of your boosters:
2. X2 ‚Äî doubles the value of any number block
3. Bomb ‚Äî destroys surrounding blocks

Flash ‚Äî removes all stones from the field

Don‚Äôt let the blocks stack above the top boundary for more than three seconds ‚Äî or it‚Äôs game over!

Complete challenging levels, set high scores in endless mode, and become the ultimate merge master!
hits.howToPlayText: Swipe left or right on an empty area of the screen (or drag with the left mouse button held down) to move the block into position. Release your finger (or let go of the mouse button) to drop the block.

hits.title: Fruit Chopper
hits.description:
Grand fruit slasher is out!

Gameplay is zero hassle. Time your throws carefully and try to slash multiple fruits at once to get bonus score! Be nimble and accurate - DO NOT MISS!

You'll get one cocktail per every level completed. After you get 4 cocktails, you will get free spin of fortune wheel! RARE COCKTAILS = BETTER REWARDS!

Can you reach level 100?
hits.howToPlayText:
You try to slash / cut fruits as they come or are thrown ‚Äî particularly trying to hit multiple fruits with one throw/slash to get bonus points. The aim is to keep going without missing.
You tap or swipe (depending on the moment) to time your throw/slash. Time it carefully so you can hit as many fruits in one go as possible.
Important: Do NOT miss ‚Äî if you fail to hit fruits properly, it affects your progress.

hits.title: Run The Electricity
hits.description:
Run The Electricity is a unique puzzle game that combines simplicity and benefits for your mind. It is designed to give relaxation, help to cope with stress and improve concentration.

Instead of intense gameplay and a race against time, a calm process awaits you here: you just need to connect lines, lamps and energy sources in a closed circuit to turn on the light.

Minimalistic design, smooth animation and soothing music create an atmosphere of complete tranquility comparable to yoga. This is not just a game, but a means to meditate and combat anxiety. You can play it at home, on the road, or at work to distract yourself and restore your mental balance.

Smart puzzles train logic and imagination, and simple mechanics allow you to have fun from the first seconds. Discover a world of light, harmony and tranquility!
hits.howToPlayText:
Playing this game is easy and enjoyable. All you need to do is tap on the lines and turn them until you get a closed electrical circuit.

For the light to come on, at least one lamp and a wire must be connected in it. As soon as this happens, the lines will shine, and you will get a feeling of completeness and tranquility.

Each puzzle takes only a few seconds, but it brings a lot of fun. This makes the game ideal for short pauses, trips, or waiting. You don't have to rush: the levels are unlimited in time, and you can solve them at your own pace.

With each new stage, the tasks become more interesting and diverse, training concentration and attention. Conduct Electricity will help to cope with anxiety, give positive emotions and become an excellent anti-stress remedy. Just open the game, start connecting the lines, and feel your mind calm down.

hits.description:
Stack Em Up! is a casual single-player puzzle game where your goal is to connect stacks of the same color to combine them. By chaining same-colored stacks, you build longer stacks; you try to reach stacks of length 10 or more.
It‚Äôs stylised and simple in controls.

hits.howToPlayText:
Tap on a stack: You select a stack by tapping it.
Connect with other stacks of the same color: Once you select a stack, you try to link it to other stacks of the same color to form a longer chain.
Form stacks / chains of 10 or more: One of the objectives is to make long stacks (length ‚â• 10). Bigger stacks give more ‚Äúscore‚Äù / help you meet level-goals.
Watch your moves: You have limited moves or constraints per level; you must achieve the objective before you run out of moves, or before you run out of opportunity. 
Progress through levels: Levels get harder as you go, likely adding complications (more colors, tricky board layouts, etc.).

hits.title: Art'N Ball
hits.description:
Art'N Ball is a mix between classic tennis and 3D platform game. The player will travel different locations within the Art‚ÄôN Ball rolling-out world, skillfully returning his Earth-ball to have it pass walls, art exhibits, photo and puzzle challenges to finally set it free from its enclosed gallery pathway into infinite Space. 

He will experience different levels of complexity as the Earth-ball takes him from countryside or mountainous territories to the inner bowels of the underground, the depths of the seas, past frantic cityscapes towards arty lush landscapes and onto a surprise finish journey in orbit‚Ä¶
hits.howToPlayText:
Play Ball With Art!

The player has to ceaselessly return the ball with his racket in a gallery hallway, which takes twists and turns and narrows or widens as the player changes ambiance, until he meets a Level boss at the end of 3 Acts in order to exit the gallery. He constantly needs to keep an eye on the Earth-ball trajectory to anticipate its return and take it with the most appropriate angle to overcome obstacles and artfully squeeze his way out.
He can maximize his gameplay by catching bonuses, completing image puzzles, taking in-game world screenshots, or lighting exhibits to uncover their art contents, while getting a comfortable view of the outside scenery through large bay windows and enjoying a cosy or rhythmic music atmosphere.
He may also refine his strategy by prioritizing moving the ball forward to finish a level versus finishing puzzles or taking screenshots to earn extra lives and better score and level ranking.
He has to beware of maluses which will slow down his progression, but the good news is that these can actually turn to his advantage, e.g getting a chance to retrieve an extra life (in completing the missing blocks of a puzzle or hitting a final screenshot) or simply getting an easy way out with a downsized racket.

Desktop controls:

Menus:
mouse + click left to access menus/icons

In game:
mouse move: racket control up-down-left-right
click left: launch ball & move forward
P: pause/unpause game

Mobile controls:

Menus:
tap to access menus/icons

In game:
touch & move racket: racket control up-down-left-right
touch move icon: launch ball & move forward


Average time to complete a level using the "Save game" option is about 20 to 30min for beginners. 
"Save game" option allows the user to save the game at every Act end (3 Acts per level, 8 levels) and at every beginning of level ("Load game" to continue to play).
The player will be able to replay all levels which were previously completed (and saved) thanks to the 'Choose game level" menu.

A Training Room is accessible from the main menu. It explains the game principles/mechanics (but only partly to let the player discover by himself), shows an automatic demo and allows the player to test the game before entering Level 1.

hits.howToPlayText:
- For aiming click anywhere on the table and rotate the cue
- For precise aiming, turn the precision aim wheel on the right side of the screen, or aim the cue while holding down the Shift button if you play on PC
- To hit, click on the cue on the left side of the screen and pull towards the desired force of the blow, then release
- For screws, click on the ball icon with a dot in the upper right part of the screen, move the impact point and confirm the installation of the point by clicking on the green button. If you're playing on a PC, you can hold down the X button on your keyboard while aiming to move the point of impact
- To change the inclination of the cue, click on the cue ball icon at the top of the screen. In this mode, tap anywhere on the screen and raise the cue to the desired angle, then confirm the change by pressing the green button. If you play on a computer, you can hold down the Z button while aiming, this will also change the tilt of the cue.

hits.howToPlayText:
Swipe to throw your weapon at enemies, showcasing incredible ninja mastery.  While the weapon is in your possession, time moves slowly, giving you the chance to carefully plan each move. But as soon as you throw the weapon, time returns to its normal speed. Therefore, every action you take must be deliberate and precise to find the perfect moment for an attack. 

The mission will end when all enemies on the battlefield are defeated.  However, don‚Äôt forget to stay aware of your surroundings‚Äîsome opponents may be faster, stronger, or craftier than they initially appear. 

Stay stealthy, use the environment, and take advantage of the time-slowing mechanic to secure victory.  Your task is not just to attack, but to do so with cold calculation and the elegance of a true master.

hits.title: Electron dash
hits.description:
Attract. Repel. Survive.

Master the invisible forces of physics in this high speed magnetic arcade game. You do not just run, you glide, slam, and swing using the power of magnetism.

Use the polarity slider to instantly switch your charge between Red and Blue. Repel off walls to launch yourself across the map, or attract toward magnetic pillars to drift around tight corners.

Key Features:
Unique Control System: Master the polarity slider to push and pull your way to victory.

Physics Based Movement: Feel the momentum as you squish into walls and rocket through open spaces.
hits.howToPlayText:
Feel the Pull!
Navigate complex mazes using nothing but the power of attraction and repulsion. Adjust your magnetic charge to fly through the air, dodge traps, and collect coins.

How to Control:
The Slider: This is your steering wheel found at the bottom of the screen.
Slide Left: Activates Negative Charge (Blue).
Slide Right: Activates Positive Charge (Red).
Let Go: Returns to Neutral (Momentum only).

Rules of Physics:
Opposites Attract: Positive pulls you toward Negative.
Likes Repel: Positive pushes you away from Positive. Use this to launch yourself!

Your Mission:

1. Collect all Coins.
2. Reach the Finish Zone safely.
3. Do it before the Timer runs out!

hits.title: Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive
hits.description: Experience the excitement of Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive, a dynamic game where you merge items to craft powerful tools and potions. Test your strategy as you navigate dungeons. Play for free online on both mobile and desktop. Embrace your heroic side!
hits.howToPlayText:
Welcome to our thrilling adventure game! Your journey consists of two main parts: merging items and exploring dungeons.

Merging Items 
In the lower part of the screen, you will find the merging grid. This is where you combine different items to gain various effects:
- Weapons: Merge different weapon parts to create powerful weapons that deal damage to enemies.
- Potions: Combine potions to restore health and boost your survivability.
- Keys: Merge keys to unlock chests scattered throughout the dungeon, which contain valuable loot.
- Coin Pouches: Collect and merge coin pouches to purchase new items from the shop and expand your inventory by buying travel bags from the merchant.

Dungeon Exploration 
In the upper part of the screen, your character moves through the dungeon level by level. Use the items you've merged to overcome challenges and defeat enemies as you delve deeper into the dungeon. 

Embark on this epic journey, combine powerful items, and conquer the depths of the dungeon!

hits.title: Eating Simulator The Italian Animals Brainrot
hits.description:
Eating Simulator The Italian Animals Brainrot A fun physics puzzle game: feed hungry animals from Italian memes by using gravity, logic, and creativity!

Is a one-of-a-kind physics puzzle game where your mission is to feed adorable and funny animals inspired by Italian memes. Each level challenges your logic, reflexes, and creativity: manipulate objects, control gravity, and build action chains to deliver food straight into the paws or beaks of quirky creatures. The game offers dozens of levels with increasing difficulty, hilarious scenarios, surprising solutions, and signature humor. Attention to detail and precision will be the key to success, while your reward will be the grateful looks of happy, well-fed animals. Dive into a world of carefree fun, where physics is your main tool for playful experiments, and every completed level brings fresh emotions. hits.title: Card Quest: 10 Minute Adventure
hits.description: Dudes, this is a very short strategic card battle game that blends tactical gameplay with quirky humor and vibrant creativity. Build powerful armies, summon creatures, cast spells, and construct buildings across unique terrains in epic turn-based battles. What sets this game apart is its dynamic terrain system‚Äîeach battlefield zone corresponds to specific card types, favoring attackers, healers, defenders, or versatile "special units" that can be placed anywhere! With customizable decks and deep strategic options, players must outwit their opponents to claim victory. Unlock new cards, upgrade your favorites heroes, and dominate the battlefield in this thrilling clash of wits and strategy. Let's go. In and out. After all, this is Card Quest: 10 Minute Adventure!
hits.howToPlayText:
‚Ä¢ Deck Building: Before starting a match, create your deck using cards you‚Äôve collected. Customize your deck based on strategy‚Äîfocus on attack-heavy units, healing abilities, or powerful spells. 
‚Ä¢ Terrain Zones: At the start of the game, choose which terrains to place on your side of the board. Each terrain type allows only certain creatures to be summoned there, except Rainbow Creatures, which are flexible. Terrain types:
- Cornfields: Strong attackers.
- Sandlands: Defensive powerhouses.
- Blue Plains: Balanced but unpredictable.
- Candy Kingdom: Weak but great at healing allies.
- Useless Swamp: Special ability users or direct-damage dealers.
‚Ä¢ Turn-Based Mechanics: On your turn, draw cards, spend resources (Magic Points), and deploy creatures, buildings, or spells onto the field. Attack enemy creatures or target their towers directly when possible. 
‚Ä¢ Winning Conditions: Outlast your opponent by maintaining stronger forces, controlling key areas, and dealing consistent damage.
