hits.description:
The mega-hit mobile jumping game is now free to play online at Arkadium. No downloads needed‚Äîjump right into the action in your browser!

Strap on your jump boots and get ready to soar! Mega Jump is a fast-paced, action-packed jump game loved by millions. Dive into a world of thrills as you leap, dodge, and collect coins, climbing higher and higher into the sky.

Mega Jump isn't just another jumping game; as one of the best free jumping games available, it tests your focus, flow, and flair in ways other games can't match.

Want to float like a balloon? Done. Need to snag every coin in sight? The Coin Magnet has your back. Feeling fiery? Grab a Super Nova boost and rocket through the levels like a comet. Watch out for sneaky monsters, tricky traps, and gravity trying to pull you back down.

With stunning cartoon visuals, gorgeous backdrops, and challenges that keep you guessing, Mega Jump delivers nonstop fun. Unlock quirky characters‚Äîfrom daring heroes to adorable critters‚Äîand make them your jumping champions.

Whether you're chasing coins or blasting into space, this jumping game turns every leap into an adventure, proving why it's ranked among the best free jumping games you can play.

Play Mega Jump Online Today
If you're looking for more heart-pounding challenges and unforgettable adventures, check out Arkadium's collection of free online games that can be played instantly without installs or downloads. Experience the thrill of racing games that put you in the driver's seat or addicting games packed with nonstop action. Enjoy!
hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is simple: Jump high, grab coins, and soar to new stages. Miss a grab, and it's Game Over‚Äîstay sharp and quickly make your next move. Keep aiming for the highest score. Use the arrow keys to move left or right to jump on the platforms.


Mega Jump Game Tips:
Gold Coins: Snag 100 for a boost.
x2 & x5 Coins: Blue and red-centered coins are worth double and quintuple‚Äîcha-ching.
Trickster Coins: Watch out; these sneaky coins run away when you get close.
Moving Coins: Slide side-to-side to catch these shifty treasures.

Boost Stars
Shiny stars launch you higher. Yellow, green, blue, and red‚Äîeach more potent than the last. Collect as many as possible to gain massive boosts and fly to new heights.

Save Stars
Falling? Tap your Save Star to rocket back up. You start with 5, so use them wisely and don't waste them.

Power-ups to the Rescue
Umbrella: Float down gently and magnetize coins.
Jump Boots: Bigger, faster, higher jumps.
Magnet: Pull in coins like a boss.
Lucky Blast: Transform everything into coins and stars.

Avoid These Dangers
Anvil: Stops you cold. Dodge it.
Ball & Chain: Slows you down‚Äîugh.
Shrinkify Potion: Tiny and tricky.

Bounce on blocks, outsmart enemies, and blast past obstacles. Ready to jump into the fun? Let's go.

hits.title: Planet 404. Episode 1
hits.description:
In this exciting puzzle platformer players embark on an amazing journey with Alice, a brave and curious explorer who finds herself stranded on a mysterious planet filled with secrets. Surrounded by enigmatic landscapes, this world is filled with puzzles that must be solved to uncover its mysteries.

 Each solution and obstacle overcome not only propels the player forward, but also reveals new chapters of Alice's adventure. The game's graphics are designed in a vibrant and colorful style, and the musical accompaniment creates an atmosphere of magic and mystery, immersing the player in an exciting world full of wonders and surprises.
hits.howToPlayText:
On a computer:
To make the character run to the right, press the D button (or the right arrow) on the keyboard.
To make the character run to the left, press the A button (or the left arrow).
To jump, press the space bar (or the up arrow).

On a smartphone or tablet:
To make the character run to the right, tap the right arrow at the bottom of the screen.
To make the character run to the left, tap the left arrow.
To jump, tap the up arrow.
To fire a shot (which becomes available at a certain level), press the fire icon button.

hits.title: Cosmic Dash
hits.description: Cosmic Dash is an endless space runner where you pilot your way across the solar system, dodging space junk, collecting tokens, and smashing asteroids. The core loop is simple‚Äîtravel as far as you can while managing jumps, shrinks, and speed boosts‚Äîbut what makes it stand out is its layered mechanics: shrinking lets you slip through debris, boosts let you destroy asteroids, and big tokens chain into massive rewards. The mix of fast reflex gameplay, mission objectives, and planetary backdrops gives it a fresh twist on the classic runner genre.
hits.howToPlayText:
üéÆ How to Play Cosmic Dash

Your mission is to dash through space, travel as far as possible, and collect tokens while avoiding or destroying obstacles.

Controls (Keyboard):

Jump ‚Äì Press UP arrow

Shrink ‚Äì Press DOWN arrow to squeeze through tight gaps and space junk

Move ‚Äì Use LEFT / RIGHT arrows to change position

Boost ‚Äì Press SPACE to speed up and smash through asteroids

Controls (Touch / Mobile):

Jump ‚Äì Swipe UP

Shrink ‚Äì Swipe DOWN

Move ‚Äì Swipe LEFT / RIGHT

Boost ‚Äì Tap the screen


ü™ê Tips & Mechanics:

Collect small tokens to increase your score.

Grab BIG TOKENS to automatically pull in smaller ones.

Use SHRINK to slip past dangerous space junk.

Use BOOST to destroy glowing asteroids and clear the way.

The further you travel, the more challenging and rewarding the journey becomes.

hits.title: Vikings
hits.description:
Vikings is a card game, develop your cards, conquer new lands.
There are many adventures waiting for you.
hits.howToPlayText: All heroes have 8 cards in the battle. There are 4 types of cards: Warriors, Berserkers, Hunters and Shamans. Simple cards (warriors) attack only with swords. To unlock the ability to attack with other cubes, it is necessary to increase the number of stars on the map, and chests will help in this. Also, as the stars increase, the damage it causes increases. The level of the card cannot be higher than the level of the hero, to increase the level of the card, you need the appropriate experience banks. All banks can be used only for simple cards. By putting on a thing, you increase the health of your hero. By wearing all 6 items, you can increase the hero's rank, which will also add health. If you don't have enough silver, use the wheel (by clicking on the silver from above), you can also find silver in the maze. You can gain experience for the hero level by completing daily tasks and winning raids. In the vastness of the game, you can get cans of energy to use them - click on the energy icon.

hits.title: Rings Untie
hits.description:
Rings Untie is a simple but addictive Ring puzzle game.
Do you want to train your brain?
Do you love colorful games with easy gameplay with fun rotate the circle puzzle games?

Both kids and adults can enjoy Rotate the Rings - a game in which you use your finger to rotate the circle to dissolve the puzzle. Save the lovely moments with your beloved people while playing this game!
This puzzle game includes various types of colorful rings: D rings, S rings, C lock rings, Ring lock... and different obstacles. A lot of exciting puzzle levels in the game are there for you to explore. If you like mini-games like Rescue the Dog, Rescue the woman and Save the Girl... this is another fun game for you.
hits.howToPlayText:
‚Ä¢ Players need to rotate the circle by touching the screen to align it perfectly with the gap
‚Ä¢ The circle will display various colors or patterns that need to be aligned with the center target within a given time
‚Ä¢ Each successful match increases the score and unlocks the next, more challenging level
‚Ä¢ Different rings bring you different challenges, plan your next move to save the time
‚Ä¢ C lock rings is easy to rotate, D ring limit the range, S ring is flexible,... and more Ring locks to explore
‚Ä¢ Pay attention to the time limit, try to complete the matches within the designated time, and avoid incorrect moves
‚Ä¢ Like other rescue the dog game, you must be careful and have a good strategy to win the game

hits.title: Go Up
hits.description:
Welcome to Go Up, the exciting free mobile game that challenges you to protect the balloon as it rises higher and higher into the sky. Get ready to put your skills to the ultimate test with this amazing balloon game that'll keep you on your toes and your eyes glued to the screen.

Picture this. You have a tiny balloon you need to protect. You need to push away all the pointy and heavy things that get in the way of your balloon going up. But it's not that easy. The sky is full of all kinds of strange things like blocks, beams, and triangles. If your balloon even touches one of these, it's all over. Exciting, right?

But it gets even better! The higher your balloon goes, the harder the game gets. The obstacles become trickier and more difficult to avoid. You can push everything out of the way, but watch out! If you send blocks flying everywhere, you will find it difficult to protect the balloon.
hits.howToPlayText:
You have a ‚Äúshield‚Äù or barrier (often a circular protective plane) that you can move around the balloon to push objects aside.
You swipe or drag on the screen to reposition your shield around the balloon. (While the store page doesn‚Äôt explicitly describe the swipe controls, that‚Äôs the common mechanic for this kind of game.)
You must time your moves carefully pushing obstacles too late or too aggressively can send them flying in directions that block the balloon again.
The higher you get (the further in the level), the more frequent and more complex obstacles appear.

hits.title: Drone Dash - Time Challenges!
hits.description:
**How to Play**

Welcome to **Drone Dash - Time Challenges** ‚Äì a fast-paced arcade puzzler where quick thinking and precision bouncing are the keys to victory! You‚Äôll control a zippy little drone that *dashes* between walls and platforms like a high-tech pinball. But this isn‚Äôt your typical platformer ‚Äì no jumping, no gravity drops. Your drone glides and ricochets from surface to surface, smoothly darting through tight spaces full of traps and twists.

Your mission? **Collect as many bullets as you can before time runs out!** The more you grab, the more stars you‚Äôll earn (up to 3 per level). Once you collect the minimum required, a glowing crystal spawns back at your starting point ‚Äì reach it to complete the level. But watch out! Hit a trap or run out of time, and it's back to the start.

Levels are short, intense, and packed with surprises. New traps and tricky tiles will keep you on your toes as you dash your way to perfection. Fast reflexes and smart movement make all the difference!

**Controls:**
üñ±Ô∏è On PC: Just click to bounce your drone in the direction of your choice!
üì± On Mobile: Just tap to bounce your drone in the direction of your choice!

Ready to test your reflexes and grab those stars? Dive into the dash and beat the clock!

hits.title: Smash & Merge Balls
hits.description:
Short Description: A skill-based arcade game with colorful physics.

Full Description: In this game, you control a character that starts a fusion chain reaction! 
Strike the colorful balls to get them moving. 
The key rule: when two balls of the same color collide, they merge, and you earn points. 
Create massive chains of mergers to maximize your high score!


(lore)
(from the Showman):
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! Welcome to the greatest show in the cosmos ‚Äî the Arena of Fusion!

Here is your instrument of chaos ‚Äî the mighty merger mallet! Don't be shy, give it a swing! 
Your mission is brilliantly simple: step onto the arena floor and prepare for a rainbow deluge! 
Smash those colorful spheres, make them crash, and when two of the same color meet ‚Äî 
BOOM! ‚Äî they fuse into a glorious explosion of points!

-Use the "WASD" or the "touchscreen joystick" to move
-Use the "Space" or the "touch-screen button" to dash
-Use "left mouse button" or "Touch screen button" to Hit
-Hit the balls and collide the balls of the same color to score points, 
when they collide they create another ball of random color.

hits.title: Rotate Cups
hits.description:
This is a rotation physics puzzle game where you control the angle of cups to try to get the balls to roll into specific cups.
Rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise as needed to turn the clear cups into ramps guiding the ball down the level.
Place at least one ball in each of the blue cups.
In this game you have to get all the balls into the blue cups lower down the screen.
Larger blue cups can hold more than one ball in them.
If there are multiple smaller blue cups you must get a ball into each of them.
Levels are not timed & you can both rotate as many times as you like & pause as many times as you like.

You can skip intermediary cups. On most levels you typically want to use all the cups on the way down, but if you are struggling to do so you can bump a ball off the outside of a cup or skip a cup entirely & it won‚Äôt harm you in the least provided your balls eventually get into the blue cups.
Some levels have a long reach you have to make the ball roll. On those levels sometimes a somewhat rapid cup spin toward the destination is enough, but in some cases you have to do that rapid spin as the starting point & then slightly spin back quickly right as the ball is leaving to give the ball a bit more lift.
hits.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Use your mouse left click button to select on the screen & drag your mouse to rotate the cups.
Drag left or down to spin clockwise.
Drag right or up to spin counterclockwise.

Touchscreen devices:
Tap the screen with a finger & drag your finger across the screen to rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise.

hits.title: Animal Merge
hits.description:
Objective: Merge animal bubbles to create upgraded animals and ultimately achieve the final objective by collecting fully developed animals.
Gameplay Instructions:
Launching the Animal Bubbles:
Tap on an animal bubble to select it.
Drag the bubble backward to aim.
Release to launch the bubble in the opposite direction.
Merging Animal Bubbles:
When two identical animal bubbles collide, they merge to create an upgraded version.
Continue merging bubbles of the same type to progress.
Achieving the Objective:
Merge two basic-level animal bubbles to form an intermediate-level animal.
Merge intermediate-level animal bubbles to create the final full-fledged animal.
Once the final animal is created, it is automatically collected as part of the level objective.
Winning the Level:
The level is completed when you have successfully created and collected the required number of final animals.

hits.title: StickerBall
hits.description:
Stickerball is a fast-paced game where you collect stickers using a ball with unique abilities! Your goal is to collect 180 colorful stickers across 9 levels by completing challenges and activating triggers that change the game‚Äôs rules. Each turn, 10 stickers fly onto the field from a purchased pack, but any uncollected ones disappear‚Äîact quickly and precisely!

The game shines with 14 dynamic triggers: freeze stickers, double rewards with "x2," turn the ball into a magnet or ghost, activate "disco" mode, or control a dual ball! The more stickers you collect in one turn, the higher your combo and the more coins you earn. Holo-stickers, with their unique designs, grant double the currency!

Play across 12 vibrant, randomly changing fields. Buy sticker packs, upgrade your collection, and strategize by activating triggers at the perfect moment to maximize rewards.
hits.howToPlayText:
How to play:
1. Aiming:
Move your cursor to aim-the arrow on the ball shows the strike direction.

2. Power Charging:
Hold LMB to fill the arrow‚Äôs power gauge. Release to launch the ball! Striking too early cancels the shot.

3. Collecting Stickers:
After striking, the ball bounces off walls, collecting stickers, coins, and crystals. The more you gather in one turn, the higher your combo and bonuses!

4. Triggers:
Collect special icons (magnet, x2, freeze, etc.) to power up the ball or alter sticker behavior. For example, "Ghost" lets the ball pass through triggers, while "Double Move" grants a second strike without new stickers appearing.

5. Buying Packs:
Before your first turn, choose a free Level 1 pack. Each pack contains 100 stickers, with 10 appearing per turn.

6. Strategy Tips:
Use "Freeze" or "Bonus" to increase the number of stickers on the field.
Combine triggers like "Magnet" + "x2" for double rewards.
Prioritize Holo-stickers - they grant x2 coins!

Instant Results: Each roll of the dice creates tension and anticipation, making gameplay exciting.

hits.title: Raised Knight
hits.description:
Get ready for the adventure in "Raised Knight," the endless runner where your skills will be put to the test!
Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!
hits.howToPlayText:
Get ready for the adventure in "Raised Knight," the endless runner where your skills will be put to the test!
Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!

[A] / [D] ‚Üí Move:
Use [A] and [D] to move left or right. Dodge obstacles, take advantage of openings, and be prepared for any challenge that comes your way. Your agility is key!

[Space] ‚Üí Jump / Float:
Hold down the [Space] key to jump or float. Jump over obstacles or float in the air to avoid dangers that cross your path. Air control can be the difference between success and failure!

[Ctrl] ‚Üí Slide:
Use [Ctrl] to slide under obstacles and save yourself from critical situations. Slide quickly to pass under low obstacles and keep advancing without missing a beat.

hits.title: Furry Kung Fu
hits.description:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from.
hits.howToPlayText:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from
–ö–∞–∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å
Control on the PC: by arrow buttons, on the smartphone - by swipes and taps on the screen.

Swipe: left/right arrow, tap on the screen to the left/right of the player.
Combo: repeatedly pressing the button in the direction where you want to apply a combo / multiple tap to the left or right of the player.
Sit down: down arrow / swipe down.
Jump: arrow up / swipe up.
Double jump (if available for a specific skin): double arrow up / two swipe up

Uppercut - squat and jump, arrow down and up / swipe down and up;
Attack from above - press the down arrow / swipe down while jumping.

The enemies drop weapons and lives. You can pick them up by tapping/tapping in their direction.

The enemy on the ball and comet can be shot down. The rat in the window can be turned off briefly by throwing a weapon at it.
Levels in the Survival game mode are unlocked as you progress through the main Campaign.

hits.title: Twisty Planet
hits.description: Twisty Planet is a minimalist arcade-style game in which your goal is to survive as long as possible on a rotating planet, dodging obstacles while collecting items to boost your score.
hits.howToPlayText:
You tap the screen (or press) to cause the planet (or the surface) to twist or rotate. This changes where obstacles appear relative to your hero.
As the planet twists, obstacles rotate into your path. You must time your taps so that you don‚Äôt collide with these obstacles. If you hit one, the game likely ends (you lose).
Alongside avoiding dangers, you can collect ‚Äúfoods‚Äù (or collectible items) as you go. These add to your score.
The main objective is to survive as long as possible while collecting items to increase your score. The longer you live and the more items you gather, the higher your score.
While not explicitly detailed in the App Store text, most games of this style gradually increase the speed, frequency, or complexity of obstacle placement as you play longer, making it harder to avoid collisions.

hits.title: Emoji Sort
hits.description: Emoji Sort is a pattern recognition puzzle game where players must fill in empty cells with the correct emojis. Each puzzle presents a grid with missing emojis that follow specific patterns - such as categories, sequences, or associations. Players analyze the existing emojis to identify the pattern (animals, food chains, transportation types, etc.) and select the appropriate emojis to complete the grid. The game features 30 increasingly challenging levels with various pattern types, and includes a hint system to help when players get stuck. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts who enjoy discovering logical connections between visual elements!
hits.howToPlayText:
Select the appropriate emoji by clicking or touching it.
Each puzzle may seem nonsensical, but there is only one correct answer!

Meet ‚ÄúSlasty: Candy Tower‚Äù - a breathtaking action-arcade where cute hungry monsters sit on the crazy-spinning platforms, and you shoot them with a candy gun to feed them up! Try to make your candy-shots precise to achieve unbelievable combos, set records and compete with other players to become the best! hits.title: Bullet Echo
hits.description:
Lead your team to victory in this unique PvP tactical team shooter! Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles and abilities. Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends. Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. Unlock and upgrade new heroes, participate in championships, and fight to unlock new perks, maps, and game modes!

Bullet Echo ‚Äî Game Description
Bullet Echo is a tactical, team-based PvP shooter with a unique top-down perspective, developed by ZeptoLab. The game stands out for its stealth-focused gameplay, fast-paced battles, and emphasis on teamwork.

Key Features
Unique Tactical Stealth Action:
Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. This creates suspenseful, strategic encounters where sound and positioning are crucial.

Team Play and Strategy:
Play with friends or match with players worldwide. Unite your team, set a strategy, and be the last team standing. The level of your hero is matched with the highest in your party, making it easy to play with friends of any experience.

Diverse Heroes:
Choose from dozens of different heroes, each with unique play styles, weapons, and abilities. Unlock and upgrade heroes to boost their power and unlock new perks.

Multiple Game Modes:

Battle Royale: Five teams of three players each compete to be the last team standing on a shrinking map.

Team vs Team: Two teams of five players face off on exclusive maps.

King of the Hill: Solo mode with 15 players battling for survival.

Additional modes and maps are available as you progress.

Progression and Rewards:
Participate in championships, accomplish missions, and receive valuable resources. Unlock new heroes, perks, maps, and game modes as you play.

Gameplay Overview
Top-Down Shooter:
The game uses a top-down view, giving players an aerial perspective of the battlefield. Stealth, quick reflexes, and tactical movement are essential.

Auto-Shooting:
Heroes automatically fire when an enemy enters their firing cone, allowing players to focus on movement and positioning.

Looting:
Collect weapons, ammo, armor, and power-ups during matches to enhance your hero‚Äôs abilities.

Revive System:
Teammates can revive each other during battles, adding another layer of teamwork and strategy.
hits.howToPlayText:
Main Objectives
Team up with friends or play solo to compete in tactical PvP battles.

Survive and eliminate enemy teams using stealth, strategy, and your hero‚Äôs unique abilities.

Collect loot and power-ups to strengthen your hero during each match.

Be the last team or player standing to win the round.

Desktop Controls (if playing via emulator or official desktop version)
Note: Bullet Echo is primarily a mobile game, but can be played on PC via Android emulators. Controls may vary depending on emulator settings.

W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys: Move your hero.

Mouse: Aim your flashlight cone (direction of vision).

Left Mouse Button: Use hero‚Äôs special ability (if mapped).

Spacebar: Interact with objects or revive teammates (if mapped).

Esc: Open game menu or pause.

You can customize key bindings in most emulators for optimal comfort.

Mobile Controls
Virtual Joystick (Left side): Move your hero around the map.

Swipe / Drag (Right side): Aim your flashlight and field of vision.

Ability Button: Tap to activate your hero‚Äôs special ability.

Interact Button: Tap to pick up items, open chests, or revive teammates.

Auto-Shoot: Your hero fires automatically when an enemy enters your cone of vision.

Tips for Success
Use walls and obstacles for cover and to ambush enemies.

Listen for enemy footsteps and gunfire to locate opponents in the fog of war.

Stick with your team for better chances of survival and to revive each other.

Upgrade and experiment with different heroes to find your best play style.

Master the controls and tactics to dominate the arena in Bullet Echo!

hits.title: Queens Royal: Sudoku Puzzle
hits.description:
Rule the Grid with Royal Precision!

Queens Royal reimagines the classic eight queens logic puzzle into a modern masterpiece, where elegance meets relentless brain-teasing challenges. Place your queens wisely, strategize every move, and conquer 5,000+ levels of mind-bending puzzles designed to test your intellect and crown you the ultimate ruler of logic!

Why Queen Royal Will Captivate You
- Brain-Training Excellence: Sharpen logic, strategy, and problem-solving skills with puzzles that evolve in complexity.
- Sleek & Serene Design: Minimalistic visuals and soothing colors keep your focus on the challenge, not clutter.
- Daily Reign Challenges: Fresh puzzles and timed events with endless variety.

Features Fit for a Monarch
- 5,000+ Levels: From gentle warm-ups to expert-tier enigmas, every puzzle is a new conquest.
- Smart Hints: Stuck? Use hints to nudge your strategy without spoiling the thrill.
- Endless Mode: Infinite levels mode lets you relax and strategize stress-free.
- Elegant Tutorials: Learn the rules in seconds‚Äîmastery takes a lifetime.

A Puzzle Game That Earns Your Crown
Easy to learn, impossible to put down. Queen Royal is the perfect blend of simplicity and obsession. Whether you‚Äôre a chess pro, a sudoku savant, or a casual gamer seeking a mental spark, Queen Royal offers a regal challenge that grows with you. Outthink the grid, outmaneuver the rules, and reign supreme in a world where every victory feels legendary.
hits.howToPlayText:
Rule the Grid with Royal Precision! In this elegant brain-teaser, your logic and strategy will be tested as you place your queens to conquer the board. With thousands of mind-bending puzzles, each move counts on your path to becoming the ultimate ruler of logic!

Game Objective:
 - The goal is to place one queen in every row, column, and color-designated zone on the grid.

Rules:
 - One Queen Per Realm: You must place exactly one queen in each row, column, and color zone.
 - No Touching Crowns: Queens cannot be placed in squares that touch each other, including diagonally.
 - Unique Solution: Every level is designed to have only one correct solution, so no guessing is required!

hits.title: The Depth of the Limbo
hits.description:
The game is about a girl in limbo who has to complete all the levels to wake up. Top view: The character must overcome 13 levels. Each level is a one‚Äîminute test cycle, but the camera rotates around the hero, changing the orientation of the space. Due to the moving camera, you can get confused about right, left, up and down, which turns simple routes into a puzzle.

The lines of the path seem familiar until they turn around your head, forcing you to rethink each goal. The goal is simple and touching: to complete the route from beginning to end, overcome the inner noise of fear, and wake up refreshed and free.

hits.description:

The game features:
- 95 Jokers with unique abilities
- Tarot and Spectral Cards that change the rules of the game in your favor
- Decks that provide bonuses for each game
- Special Vouchers - increase your chances of winning in every game
- 28 different bosses. Can you defeat them all?
hits.howToPlayText:
The goal of the game is to collect as many points as possible to defeat the Blinds.
In each game, you start with a deck of 52 standard playing cards. At the beginning of the round, 8 playing cards are dealt. You need to complete a set number of turns and collect enough chips to defeat the Blind.

Each game consists of 8 antes. Each ante is divided into 3 rounds. The goal of each round is to collect a certain number of chips and defeat the Blind of that round.
After all 8 antes have been completed, the game enters endless mode.

Progressive Difficulty: As you advance through levels, the complexity increases with more colors and larger grids.

hits.title: Color Roll 3D
hits.description:
Experience one of the most addictive, color-filled puzzle game ‚Äî Color Roll 3D! Think you've got a keen eye for details? Ready to challenge your brain? Then this color game is just for you! It's all about color, creativity, and some serious agility!

In Color Roll 3D, you'll need to copy the exact image you're shown, down to the last detail! How? Just by unrolling and arranging the vibrantly colored rolls the puzzle game give you for each level. Sounds easy, right? But wait, there's a catch! You've got to ensure the colors overlap in just the right way to perfectly match the image.

Got the image in your head? Great! Now get to work and let those colorful rolls fly! Just tap each roll and watch as it smoothly moves across your screen, bringing the image to life. But remember, it's all about getting those colors to line up just right!
hits.howToPlayText:
You are given several colored rolls. Each roll is like a ribbon or band that you can tap to start unrolling.
When you tap, the roll moves/unrolls and overlays onto the puzzle area. The goal is that the overlapping colours and their positions match the sample image you‚Äôre trying to replicate.
The challenge comes from getting the direction and position of each roll correct. If you unroll a roll the wrong way, or overlay in the wrong spot, the final image will look different from the target.

hits.title: Lost Adventure
hits.description:
"Survivors of a mid-air crash find themselves in a mysterious land. The pilot, amidst crafting, mining, and solving puzzles, works tirelessly to save passengers stranded on separate islands in the wild grass. Can they conquer the challenges, reunite, and escape the enigmatic realm before the unknown dangers lurking in the wilderness engulf them all?"

Embark on a thrilling adventure after a plane crash strands you in a mysterious, wild land. As the pilot, you must gather resources from wreckage, craft tools, and navigate through the wild grass to rescue scattered passengers on small islands.

Explore ancient ruins, solve puzzles, and mine resources to unlock the secrets of this enigmatic realm. Encounter friendly and hostile creatures, and use your crafted weapons to survive. Communicate with other survivors, separated by streams and dense vegetation, through makeshift signals.

Your journey is a test of resilience and camaraderie. Each crafted item brings you closer to reuniting with your fellow survivors and discovering the way back home. Will you conquer the challenges of the wild grass and unveil the mysteries hidden within, or succumb to the unknown dangers that lurk in the shadows? The choice is yours in this gripping and immersive adventure!
hits.howToPlayText:
Become a True Survivor!
Step into the role of a skilled pilot whose plane has crash-landed on an uncharted island‚Äîone that doesn‚Äôt exist on any Earth map. In this gripping RPG survival adventure, your mission is clear: find and rescue every passenger, brave the unknown, and uncover the island‚Äôs secrets.

Scavenge for resources, battle mysterious threats, and lead your group to safety. Rebuild what‚Äôs broken, forge alliances, and piece together a way off the island. Every choice matters, and survival depends on your courage, cunning, and determination.

Can you reunite your crew, outsmart the dangers, and escape the island that time forgot?

hits.title: Resize Stickman
hits.description:
Resize Stickman: Master Your Size, Conquer the Run!

Dive into "Resize Stickman," a thrilling and visually polished 3D runner where your only power is to change your size! The core idea is simple yet deeply engaging: your stickman automatically runs forward, and you must strategically resize him ‚Äî grow to smash through towering barriers or shrink to slip under low obstacles.

This game stands out in the crowded runner genre by blending instant pick-up-and-play simplicity with hybrid-casual depth. It's not just about reflexes; it's about smart, split-second decisions. With a sleek, reactive interface, satisfying animations, and a wealth of content including a vast collection of collectible skins with a progressive gacha-style shop and multi-tiered achievements, "Resize Stickman" offers a premium-quality experience. Fully localized for a global audience, it delivers a captivating and rewarding challenge that will keep you coming back for more.
hits.howToPlayText:
Objective: Guide your Stickman as far as possible by overcoming a variety of physical obstacles. Your goal is to achieve a high score by completing as many challenging levels as you can, earning coins to unlock awesome new skins and achievements.

Core Mechanic: Your Stickman runs automatically. You have one crucial ability: control his size to navigate the environment.

Mobile Controls:
Swipe Down: Instantly SHRINK your Stickman to a small size.
Swipe Up: Instantly GROW your Stickman to a large size.

How to Win: Success depends on your timing and strategy. Analyze each obstacle quickly ‚Äî some require you to be small, others to be big. Master the rhythm of resizing to survive the ever-changing course and set a new personal record!

One Man Army: Battle Game will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.

hits.title: Block Puzzle Magic
hits.description: Block Puzzle Magic is a simple yet addictive puzzle game that challenges players to arrange blocks on a grid to clear full rows and columns. It blends relaxing gameplay with a bit of strategy: you can play in a few seconds to refresh your mind, but thinking ahead helps you last longer.
hits.howToPlayText:
You‚Äôre given a fixed grid (often 10√ó10) into which you must place (drag) blocks of various shapes.
You drag block pieces from a preview area and drop them onto the grid. You have to find space where the block fits.
When you completely fill an entire horizontal row or vertical column with blocks, that entire row/column clears out (is removed), and you score points.
You cannot rotate the block pieces ‚Äî they must be used in the shape presented.
Because the blocks come in various shapes, you need to plan placements intelligently so you don‚Äôt block yourself from placing future pieces. The game ends when there is no more space to place any of the current block pieces.
When none of the available block pieces can fit anywhere on the grid, the game ends. Your final score depends on how many rows/columns (and combos) you cleared

hits.title: Stack Master
hits.description:
Stack master is a minimalistic, endless stacking game where your goal is to build the tower as high as possible by perfectly aligning moving blocks.
The graphics are simple and clean, focusing on smooth gameplay without distractions.
You compete globally for the highest score (tower height) on leaderboards.
hits.howToPlayText:
When you start, a block (or ‚Äúslice‚Äù) begins sliding horizontally across the screen at some height.
You tap the screen (or tap a control) to drop the moving block onto the block beneath it.
The better the alignment with the block below, the more of the block remains. If part of the block overhangs, the overhanging part is cut off.
If you drop with a slight misalignment, the excess portion is cut away and removed, making your next block smaller.
If your misalignment is very poor (i.e. almost no overlap), you might lose the block entirely, ending the game.
Each successful drop continues the tower upward. The goal is to stack as many as possible, reaching the highest possible height (score).
As the tower gets higher, it becomes more challenging. The blocks may move faster or require more precision. (This is common in stacking games of this type.)

hits.title: Cookie Match
hits.description:
Cookie Match is a sliding puzzle game where you must match each cookie to its corresponding cutter.

If you move the cookies off the edge of the board or into knives, they‚Äôll be destroyed. Use the tubs of butter as barriers to keep the cookies in one piece.
hits.howToPlayText:
Mouse Click or Swipe.

All cookies move in the same direction at the same time.

The objective of the game is to complete all cookies in any order.

hits.title: Pim Path
hits.description:
Reach the trophy at the end of the level to win, but it's not as easy as it might seem. You can't fall off the platforms; spikes and blades will be everywhere, making the levels more challenging. One wrong step and it's game over.
You'll need to stay calm, pay attention, be agile, have good reflexes, and most importantly, don't get angry.
hits.howToPlayText:
Objective: Reach the trophy at the end of the level. Complete all the levels.
PC Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys ‚Äì Character Movement
Space ‚Äì Jump
Mobile Controls:
On-screen buttons.
